He is requesting his seventh loan with KADET Ltd and has successfully paid back the previous loans. He will use the new loan of KES 70,000 to pay his milk suppliers. He will use the profits to purchase a motorbike to use to supply milk to his customers. 

His hopes are to grow his business and to look after the welfare of his family.

loans.use: To pay his milk suppliers.

loans.name: Rudik

texts.en:
Rudik is 34 years old. He lives in the city of Ijevan with his wife and two small children: his 6-year-old son and 3-year-old daughter. His wife doesn’t work: she stays at home and takes care of the children.

In 2004 Rudik started his own business: selling spare parts for cars. In the beginning, he only brought spare parts from Georgia to fulfill his clients’ orders. Then Rudik rented a shop where he sells spare parts, while he continues to fulfill his clients’ special orders. He brings the parts from Georgia by himself, which allows him to sell his merchandise relatively cheaply, therefore, attracting more clients. 

Rudik’s business allows him to support his family. He is requesting a 1,000,000 AMD loan to buy winter tire casings and different spare parts to resell.

loans.use: to buy winter tire casings and spare parts to resell.

loans.name: Transito Alberto

texts.es: Transito Alberto de treinta y siete años de edad vive con su compañera de vida y sus hijos. El posee una venta de jarrones y otras obras artesanales es muy conocido por la zona pues su trabajo es muy artístico, bonito, de excelente calidad y sobre todo a muy buen precio, se ha hecho de mucha clientela últimamente y no quiere decepcionar los,  quiere abastecer mas su negocio con las artesanías que realiza, para siempre estar adelante de la competencia; Transito es un hombre de visión a futuro su mayor pasatiempo es trabajar,  piensa que la clave del éxito depende sólo de lo que podamos hacer de la mejor manera posible. El sabe que tiene un don  y quiere aprovecharlo es  por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar arcilla, pintura, y barniz. Transito Alberto tiene la esperanza que de esta forma podrá llevar a su hogar seguridad económica y una mejor calidad de vida para su familia,
texts.en: Transito Alberto is 37 and lives with his wife and children. He sells vases and other decorative items and is well known in the area.  His artisanry is considered very artistic, beautiful, of good quality and inexpensive.  He has a good client following and wishes to create and stock more muy artisanal objects to stay ahead of his competitors. Transito is a man with a vision and believes in hard work as the key to success. He knows his talents and for this reason seeks a credit from INTEGRAL to buy clay, paint and varnish to support his business. Transito Alberto has every hope of providing a bright future for his family.

loans.use: clay, paint and varnish

loans.name: René Antonio

texts.es: René Antonio de 54 años de edad, habita en casa propia en la cual ha establecido su negocio. El Señor René vive solo y ha trabajado duramente para salir adelante y ganarse el pan de cada día. Él se dedica  a la venta de gas propano, tiene 8 años de dedicarse a esta actividad y gracias a su arduo trabajo y con la ayuda de Dios todo poderoso ha sabido mantener su negocio a flote.  Empezó desde muy abajo pero gracias a la experiencia que ha ido adquiriendo a lo largo de la vida de su negocio ahora ya es muy reconocido en la zona y cuenta con algunos clientes fijos. Una de las ventajas que  el Señor René tiene  con su negocio es que se encuentra en una zona bien accesible en donde muchas personas pueden llegar fácilmente.  El Señor René se estableció en el mundo de los negocios y por el momento la venta de gas propano es su principal fuente de ingresos por lo que desea seguir invirtiendo de tal forma que su negocio siempre este arriba de la competencia y los clientes lo sigan prefiriendo. Ha estado pensando mucho sobre la forma de hacer su negocio más atractivo  para los clientes y ha llegado a la conclusión de invertir en su negocio en un mayor  abastecimiento de tal forma de que los clientes siempre encuentren el gas cuando lo necesiten y no tengan que acudir a otro establecimiento. Además su deseo es cubrir una mayor demanda con el fin de mejorar sus ingresos que le permitan accesar a una mejor oportunidad de vida. Debido a lo anterior ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para llevar a cabo su deseo. Por lo tanto el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de tambos de gas propano. Confía en Dios todo poderoso que de esta forma  logrará su sueño.
texts.en: René Antonio is 54 and has his own house from which he runs his business.  He works hard every day selling propane gas, an activity that he has been blessed with maintaining for 8 years through hard work.  Hard experience has served his business well, as he is now well known and has a solid client base. The advantage Señor René's business has is that it is well-located for sales in an area with easy access.  He has built his propane gas business as his main economic activity and now wishes to invest further to grow his business and stay ahead of competitors. He has given much thought to how to better serve his clients with convenience and ease of access so that customers do not need to seek other gas providers.  He also hopes to increase revenues and improve his standard of living.  For this reason, he seeks a loan from INTEGRAL to carry out his plans to purchase an additional stock of gas canisters. He has much faith that he will be able to achieve his dreams.

loans.use: to buy propane gas

loans.name: Simeon

texts.en:
Semion is 40 years old, married, and has two children. He has been a tailor for seven years earning a monthly income of 20,500 KES.

Semion is requesting his third  loan for 100,000, which he will use to purchase clothing materials and sewing accessories. His anticipated profits will be put back into the business. His dream is own a car.

loans.use: to purchase clothing materials and sewing accessories.

loans.name: Henry Alexander

texts.es:
Henry, necesita comprar mercadería para el negocio, adquiriendo controles, carteras, Dvd y Cd, ya que quiere aumentar la disponibilidad en el negocio y poder atender la demanda de los clientes.
Él ha tenido una buena experiencia en el manejo de los préstamos, ya que su negocio está mejorando y creciendo, en estos meses su familia ha aumentado ya que es padre de una niña de unos pocos meses de nacida.
texts.en:
Henry needs to buy merchandise for his business: remote controls, DVD and CD wallets, DVDs and CDs. He wants to have more articles available to be able to satisfy his clients' demand.
He has had a good experience managing loans and his business is improving and growing. His family has grown during the last few months, as he is now the father of a few months old baby girl.

loans.use: to buy remote controls, wallets, DVDs and CDs.

loans.name: Julius

texts.en:
Julius is 28 years old. He is married to Pauline and they have been blessed with one child. He has been running a transport business for the last three years earning a monthly income of KES 20,000.

He is taking his second loan of KES 90,000 which he will use to purchase spare parts to fix his his car which he uses as a taxi. He plans to repay the loan with the anticipated profit from the business.

His hopes and dreams are to have a wholesale spare parts shop.

loans.use: To purchase spare parts to fix his taxi.

loans.name: Jose Gilberto

texts.es:
José, se decidió por un nuevo préstamo, ya que la temporada que se acerca es buena para aumentar las ventas, por eso desea comprar calzado de diferentes estilos, para damas, caballeros y niños, él ha logrado mejorar en el comercio, ya que dispone de mercadería para ofrecer a la clientela.
Su condición ha mejorado, ya que es una persona con experiencia tanto en el comercio como en el manejo de créditos.
texts.en:
José decided to get a new loan because the approaching season is good for sales. Because of this, he wants to buy shoes for men, women and children in different styles. His business has improved because he now has more merchandise to offer his customers.
His condition has improved because he now has experience both in business and in the management of loans.

loans.use: to buy shoes for men, women and children.

loans.name: Oneyda Esmeralda

texts.es:
La joven Oneyda de 28 años de edad, es originaria de Condega  municipio de Estelí, es casada, comerciante se dedica  a la venta cosméticos, ropa y joyas de plata. Este negocio lo empezó gracias al apoyo de su tía quien la yudo con capital y mercadería para que vendiera y fuera reuniendo su propia capital y generar ingresos por su propia cuenta. Además de eso esta estudiando en la universidad  así que parte de los ingresos los ahorra para pagar su universidad.
Ella realizo el crédito para comprar mercadería tales como cosméticos, ropa, zapatos para vender y surtir su mini tienda. Ya que las ventas en los meses de Diciembre y Enero son muy buenas desea aprovechar la temporada. Uno de sus sueños es tener su propio Local y desarrollarse como una profesional de éxito.
texts.en: Oneyda, a young woman of 28 years, is originally from Condega, in the municipal of Estelí.  She is married, and a businesswoman who works selling cosmetics, clothes, and silver jewelry.  This business started thanks to the support of her aunt who helped her with capital and merchandise so that she could make sales, and renew her own capital and generate income for herself.  In addition to this, she is studying in the university, so she saves part of her income to pay her university.  She took out the loan in order to purchase merchadise such as cosmetics, clothes, and shoes to sell and to stock her small store.  Because the sales in the months of December and January are very good, she wants to take advantage of the season.  One of her dreams is to have her own place and develop herself as a successful professional.

loans.use: to purchase merchadise such as cosmetics, clothes, and shoes to sell and to stock her small store.

loans.name: Seyfaddin

texts.ru: Seyfaddin jivet v Baku regione vmeste so svoyey semyoy. On ne jenat i ne imeyet detey. Seyfaddin uje 3 qoda kak imeyet svayo taxi . Seychas on nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit zapchasti dlya mashini kotoraya isportilas i po etoy prichine on ne mojet rabotat. Seyfaddin 23 qoda. On xochet v dolneyshem uludshit svoy bizness i uvelichit svoy mesachniy doxod, a zatem jenitsya i priobresti svoyu semyu. On molodoy i ochen userdniy v robote chelovek.
texts.en: Seyfaddin lives in the Baku region with his family.  He is not married and has no children.  Seyfaddin has had his own taxi for three years.  He currently needs 2000 AZN to purchase spare parts for his car, which broke down, and this is why he is not able to work.  Seyfaddin is 23 years old.  He wants to improve his business in the future and increase his monthly income, and then get married and have his own family.  He is a young and very hardworking person.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts for his car

loans.name: Saxib

texts.ru: Saxib ne jenat i ne imeyet detey. On jivet v Baku regione. Sahib 41 qod. On uje 11 let kak zanimayetsya prodajey nijnego belya a takje sportivnoy odejdi dlya jenshin v svayom magazine. Saxib seychas nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit noviye tovari dlya pereprodaji tak kak on xochet uvelichit mesachniyi doxodi. Saxib xochet v budushem tak je prodovat i mujskuyu odejdu v svayom magazine.
texts.en: Saxib is 41 years old, single and has no children. He lives in the Baku region of Azerbaijan. For more then eleven years Saxib has had a clothing store where he sells lingerie, tights and sporting clothes for women. Currently Saxib needs a loan of 2000 AZN in order to purchase additional goods for sale in his store since he hopes to increase his monthly income. In the future Saxib is hoping to also sell men's clothing in his store.

loans.use: to purchase goods for resale

loans.name: Kombo

texts.en: Kombo, 39 years old, is married and has 3 children aged 8,10 and 14. He has operated a cafeteria for 3 years. His other source of income is from his rental houses. Since he join Faulu Kenya, Kombo has been able to improve his standard of living. He hopes to be financially stable in the future. Kombo has applied for a loan of KES 50,000 to buy cooking oil, wheat flour and sugar.

loans.use: To buy cooking oil, wheat flour and sugar

loans.name: Abednego Maithya

texts.en:
Abednego Maithya is a 49-year-old grocery store owner in Voi. He is a married father of four. Abednego Maithya has been running his store for the last ten years successfully. 

This will be Maithya's fifth loan from KADET. He plans to use it to purchase more cabbages, carrots, tomatoes, onions and peas to sell to his customers. He will use the anticipated profits to educate his children. Abednego Maithya hopes to have a bigger, more profitable business.

loans.use: to purchase more cabbages, carrots, tomatoes, onions and peas

loans.name: Augustine

texts.en: Augustine, 38 years old, is married and has 3 children aged 5, 6, and 11. He owns a lorry which he uses in his transport business. Augustine has been in this business for 3 years and employs 2 people. His business customers are mainly companies, which makes his business environment conducive. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, Augustine has been able to grow economically. He hopes to be financially independent in the future. Augustine has applied for a loan of KES 100,000 to buy spare parts and to service his lorry.

loans.use: To  buy spare parts and to service his truck

loans.name: Gibson Muasa

texts.en:
Gibson Muasa is a 38 year old fish monger in Kilifi. He is a married father of two. Gibson has been in the business of selling fish for the past ten years and he is doing great.

This is Gibson’s fourth loan from KADET. He plans to purchase more fish to sell to his customers. He will use the anticipated profits to educate his children and repay his loan. He hopes to have a happy, prosperous family.

loans.use: to purchase more fish.

loans.name: Roberto Antonio

texts.es:
Roberto, solicita un nuevo préstamo para utilizarlo en comprar leña para venderla y de esa forma podrá mejorar sus ganancias, este prestamo es diferente su utilidad, ya que la idea de Roberto es no depender de una misma actividad economica.
El considera que el prestamo anterior le ayudo, porque le permitió sacar buenas cosechas de maiz y frijoles, debido a los fertilizantes que compro y mejoro la calidad de vida de el y su familia.
texts.en:
Roberto has requested a new loan to invest it in the purchase of firewood to sell in order to improve his income. This loan is different than his previous loans because he has multiple businesses.

He says that the previous loan was a great help for him, because thanks to the fertilizers he bought with it he succeeded in obtaining good harvests of maize and beans, thus improving his family’s standard of living.

loans.use: To buy firewood to sell.

loans.name: Aniccia Francisca

texts.es: Aniccia Francisca tiene 23 años de edad, ella es una emprendedora que inicio la venta de mercadería en general por la suegra quien le  enseño este negocio con el objetivo de ayudarla que salga adelante, ella comienza ofreciendo a varias amigas los productos y posteriormente le gusto y ahora lo realiza de forma ambulante y así genera ingresos para la familia y sobre todo se siente super independiente. Aniccia está solicitando crédito para la compra de variedad de ropa para damas, caballeros, sandalias y cosméticos.
texts.en: Aniccia Fracisca is a 23-year-old entrepreneur who began selling general merchandise because of her mother-in-law, who showed her about the business with the aim of helping her get ahead. She started out selling products to several of her friends, but because she liked it, she now sells merchandise door-to-door, thus generating an income for her family. Above all, she feels super independent. Aniccia is requesting this loan in order to purchase a variety of apparel for men and women, sandals, and cosmetics.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of apparel for men and women, sandals, and cosmetics.

loans.name: Brayan Josue

texts.es: Brayan, necesita invertir en el negocio que por eso solicitan nuevamente un préstamo, comprando pantalones jeans, camisas, ropa interior, para aumentar la mercadería, los estilos y colores aumentando  la posibilidad de mejorar los ingresos y las condiciones de su familia. Él  espera tener buenos resultados con esta inversión ya que el mes de diciembre aumenta las ventas.
texts.en: Brayan needs to invest in his business and so is again requesting a loan to buy jeans, shirts and underwear, thereby expanding the styles and colors of his merchandise.. This increases the possibility of improving his income and his family’s living conditions. He expects this investment to yield good results since sales increase in December

loans.use: to buy jeans, shirts and underwear.

loans.name: Julia Petrona

texts.es: Julia Petrona es una emprendedora que se le apoyado con el financiamiento ya tiene varios ciclo trabajando con Fundación León 2000, en cual ha demostrado ser una persona responsable y con deseo de superación. Ella nos expresa que con el apoyo que se le ha brindado con el crédito ha aumentado su inventario  y además su clientela, ya que les ofrece variedad de producto. Julia Petrona está solicitando crédito para invertir nuevamente en el negocio para comprar variedad de ropa y cosméticos, sandalias.
texts.en: Julia Petrona is an entrepreneur who has sought the support of loans and to date has had several cycles working with Fundación León where she’s shown herself to be a responsible person who wants to improve.  She expresses that with the helps she’s gotten from the financing; her inventory has increased as has her clientele because she offers a variety of products.  Julia Petrona is asking for a loan to once again invest in the business buying a variety of clothes, cosmetics and sandals.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of clothes, cosmetics and sandals.

loans.name: Alikishi

texts.en: Alikishi is a 59-year-old man who lives in Saatli with his wife and two sons. He is a persevering and very responsible man with a great desire to get ahead every day. For eight years, Alikishi has run a grocery store in town. He sells mostly food products and manages to earn a significant income, which enables him to provide for his family. His business is the only income for the family. Alikishi requested a loan of 1,100 AZN from AqroInvest CU to increase his revenues.

loans.use: to increase his revenues.

loans.name: Amil

texts.en: Amil is 38 years old, married and has two sons and one daughter.  With the desire to live better, six years ago Amil started a grocery store, which is located nearby his home.  Every month he earns 350 AZN.  Now Amil needs financial help for his business and has applied for a 1400 AZN loan. He will use this money to purchase grocery items, mineral water and stocks.  Amil believes that increasing his inventory will lead to a more successful business.

loans.use: to purchase grocery items.

loans.name: Agasahab

texts.en:
Agasahab operates a wholesale flour store in the Lankaran, where he lives with his wife and three sons.  He started the business six years ago with a small amount of money. 

Agasahab came to AqroInvest because he needed to invest in his business.  He successfully repaid the past loan and made great strides in growing his business. 

Now Agasahab requests a loan of 1500 AZN to buy sacks of flour. He will reinvest his earnings in the business.

loans.use: to buy sacks of flour.

loans.name: Jose Amadeo

texts.es: José, quiere comprar más mercadería de temporada por eso se atreve a solicitar otro préstamo, ya que ha tenido buenas experiencias con la inversión en anteriores, en esta ocasión comprará juguetes plásticos con fines navideños y ropa nueva en Blusas, vestidos y otra mercadería para ofrecer. El y su familia han mejorado su condición, ya que la familia le apoya en sus ventas por lo que los beneficios son para todos.
texts.en:
José wants to buy more seasonal merchandise, so he is requesting another loan because he had good experiences with the previous investments.  This time he will buy plastic toys for Christmas and new clothes in blouses, dresses, and other merchandise to sell.

He and his family have improved their situation, since the family helps him in his sales so the profits are for everyone.

loans.use: to buy plastic toys.

loans.name: Edwin Ernesto

texts.es:
Edwin, se encuentra con un nuevo proyecto, es la compra de un vehículo, del cual solamente tiene una parte, por lo que solicita este préstamo para completar su valor, este será una buena oportunidad para adquirir un medio de transporte que le apoyara en la ejecución de su trabajo, pues el anterior le dio algunos problemas mecanicos.
Él ha tenido un efecto positivo en la compra de las herramientas y ha podido mejorar su trabajo.
texts.en:
Edwin has a new project: buying a car.  He only has part of what he needs, which is why he is asking for this loan to cover the rest.  This will be a good opportunity to have a means of transportation that will help him do his job, as his last car had mechanical problems.

The loan has had a positive effect in allowing him to buy tools and he has been able to improve his work.

loans.use: make a supplementary payment to buy a car

loans.name: Zakeyeh

texts.en:
Zakeyeh is a 50-year-old married woman from Al Hussein, Amman, Jordan and a mother of 9 children. Due to cultural issues her son appears in the photo in her place.

Zakeyeh is selling cleaning products and she is requesting a loan of 1200 Jordanian Dinar (JOD) to purchase more cleaning products for trading purposes. 

Zakeyeh is looking to improve her client base by distributing her products to other areas with an aspiration of helping her children with marriage expenses.

loans.use: to purchase cleaning products for trading purposes

loans.name: Komiljon

texts.ru: Комилджон честный и добросовестный человек. Он женат и имеет четверых детей. Более 10 лет он занимается купле- продажей скота. Комилджон старается расширить свой бизнес, чтобы содержать свою семью в хороших условиях жизни. Комилджон постоянно советуется со своей семьей и чувствует поддержку с их стороны. Данный момент Комилджон нуждается в средствах для  постройки сарая и закупки корма на зимний период. С этой целью Комилджон запрашивает займ в размере 2150$ США. Он надеется на вашу помощь и заранее благодарен вас за вашу доброту и милосердие.
texts.en: Komiljon is an honest and conscientious man.  He is married and has four children.  He has been buying and selling cattle for more than ten years.  Komiljon is trying to expand his business to ensure good living conditions for his family.  Komiljon constantly seeks advice from his family members, who support and help him.  Komiljon currently needs funds to build a shed and to purchase animal feed for the winter.  This is why he has requested a loan in the amount of 2,150 USD.  He looks forward to receiving your help and thanks you in advance for your kindness and mercy.

loans.use: To buy cattle and cattle feed.

loans.name: Rosa Guadalupe

texts.es: Rosa Guadalupe tiene 32 años de edad, la actividad económica a la se dedica es a la venta  de mercadería en general y también tiene un poco de librería, ella ya tiene un local establecido donde sus clientes la visitan, ya sean clientes fijos o eventuales. Este negocio lo emprende por la necesidad de generar ingresos a la familia. Rosa Guadalupe está solicitando crédito para aumentar su inventario en el cual comprara variedad de ropa para todas las edades y estilo y cosméticos que  también buscan sus clientes.
texts.en:
Rosa Guadalupe is 32 years old and the economic activity in which she is involved is the sale of general merchandise and she also stocks some books. She already has an established premises where her customers, both long-term or casual, visit her.

She started up this business out of a necessity to generate an income for her family. Rosa Guadalupe is requesting a loan to increase her inventory. She will buy a variety of clothing to suit all ages and styles and cosmetics which her customers have also been requesting.

loans.use: to buy a variety of clothing to suit all ages and styles and cosmetics which her customers have also been requesting.

loans.name: Mahmoud

texts.en:
Mahmoud is a 50-year-old married man and a father of three children. He works hard to improve his family's standard of living and provide them with the best education ever. 
Mahmoud is a hardworking man. He has 25 years of experience in selling fruits and vegetables. In 2001, Mahmoud started his own business. Using a small car he owned, he started to sell fruits and vegetables to nearby villages and towns. Later he exchanged the car for a small truck, which helped a lot in expanding his business and increasing the quantity of products he was selling. His income increased at the same time. Mahmoud did all this because he was aware that he has a family that he has to take good care of and provide with a good and healthy lifestyle.
Mahmoud is requesting a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua for the first time. He will use the loan to increase his merchandise by buying special seasonal fruits and vegetables. He hopes to expand his business to start wholesale trade in the future.

loans.use: to buy special seasonal fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Njoroge

texts.en:
Njoroge is 75 years old, married, and supports one dependent. He has been in the rental housing business for the last 14 years, earning a monthly income of about Kes 60,000.

He is requesting his fifth loan with KADET of Kes 95,000. He intends to use the loan to complete a number of rental houses. With the anticipated profits he will renovate the aging rental houses.

His hopes and dreams are to renovate all his rental houses and build others.

loans.use: To complete construction of rental houses

loans.name: Maria Auxiliadora

texts.es: Maria Auxiliadora es una señora emprendedora ya que ha luchado por seguir sus objetivos de tener su negocio  que la venta de mercadería en general. Maria Auxiliadora no expresa que gracias al apoyo que se le ha brindado ha aumentado sus inventario y sus clientes, ya que les ofrece calidad de ropa y variedad. Ella ya ha tenido crédito con Fundación León 2000 en el cual ha demostrado ser una persona responsable y sobre todo emprendedora que desea salir adelante. Actualmente está solicitando crédito para invertir en el negocio en la compra de ropa de todo estilo y sandalias entre otros productos.
texts.en: Maria Auxiliadora is an enterprising woman who has fought to attain her goals of having a business selling general merchandise. Maria Auxiliadora tells us that thanks to the support that has been given her, she has increased her inventory and her customers, since she offers quality clothing in variety. She has had a loan before with Fundación León 2000 and has shown herself to be a responsible and above all, enterprising person who wants to get ahead. At present, she is asking for a loan to invest in her business buying all styles of clothing and sandals, among other products.

loans.use: to buy all styles of clothing and sandals, among other products.

loans.name: Elsa Leonor

texts.es: Elsa Leonor tiene 51 años de edad, la actividad económica a la que se dedica es a su  pulpería que la tiene ubica en su casa de habitación, su mayor sueño de Elsa siempre ha sido tener su propio negocio en el cual atreves de los años lo ha logrado ya que por la necesidad de apoyar  a su esposo en los gastos del hogar ella inicia su negocio pero siempre con el objetivo que verla muy surtida. Elsa Leonor está solicitando financiamiento para pode abastecer a la pulpería en la compra de granos básicos, aceite, frijoles, aceite entre otros productos que se buscan en su negocio.
texts.en:
Elsa Leonor is 51 and runs a grocery store out of her house.  Her greatest dream always has been to have her own business, which over the years she has been able to do to help her husband with the household expenses.

Her goal for the business is to keep it well stocked.  Elsa Leonor is requesting a loan to restock her store through buying basic grains, oil, beans and other products requested by customers.

loans.use: To buy basic grains, oil, beans and other products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy soap, sugar, and salt to sell.

loans.name: Husien

texts.en:
Husein is 41-year-old married man, and the father of four children. He works in repairing all household appliances such as washing machines, air conditioners, ovens, etc. For the past 12 years, this wide experience has helped him to gain customers' trust, and he has been able to open his own work place in 2007. Husein's business is just going fine, and the number of customers is increasing due to his hard work and good reputation.

Husein is Kiva partner Al Majmoua borrower for four consecutive cycles, all his previous loans helped to improve his business, and he is a good standing borrower at the same time.

This improvement has positively reflected his family's social situation.  Today, Husein is requesting a loan from the Kiva partner, in order to buy new or used air conditioners, to start fixing and selling them. Husein hopes he can open a big showroom for new electrical and household appliances in the future.

loans.use: To buy new Air Conditioners to trade.

loans.name: Samir

texts.en: Samir is a 46-year-old Lebanese married man. He’s living with his wife and two children, who are still attending school. He’s doing his best to be able to offer a respectable life to his children. He opened his own car spare parts in 1990. So far, he has gained a fair number of customers asking for his services and good quality items. In parallel, he has been working as a bodyguard for the past five years. Today, he needs to borrow $1600 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase additional car spare parts for his business. He notes that this will boost his sales and allow him earn superior income. In the future, he plans to open his own cars show room.

loans.use: to purchase additional car spare parts for his business.

loans.name: Khalil

texts.en:
Khalil is 56 years old, married, and has four children, three who attend school and one who works. He is the main income provider in his family and their only support. 

Khalil opened his own minimarket in 1996. He also sells vegetables and looks to further increase his product selection. He is requesting a loan for $3,000 from Ameen s.a.l., which he will use to buy the groceries for his business. He notes that this will help him develop his work and attract more clients. In the future, he plans to open other branches in the neighboring areas.

loans.use: to purchase groceries for his business.

loans.name: Ali

texts.en: Ali is a 50-year-old Lebanese married man living with his wife and three children. Two of his children are still studying and the other is working. Ali is the one responsible for covering his family expenses and paying his children’s educational fees. For this reason he decided to start his own business, so he opened his own spare car parts business twenty years ago. Today, Ali is asking to borrow $2100 from Kiva partner Ameen to purchase more spare car parts. This will allow him to earn a superior income. In the future, he plans to take out more Kiva loans to renovate his shop.

loans.use: to purchase spare car parts.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 45-year-old Lebanese married man who is living with his wife and two school-aged children. He is the one taking care of his family and looking to enhance their way of living. 

He has owned a pick-up truck since 2003. His job consists of transporting products upon customers' requests. Today, he’s in need to borrow $1,600 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to repair his pick-up in addition to painting. This will certainly facilitate his business operations and allow him to attract a wider range of customers. 

In the future, he plans to buy a bigger pick-up and serve more people.

loans.use: to repair his pick-up in addition to painting.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is a 48-year-old Lebanese married man. He lives with his wife and has ten children. Eight of them are studying and the rest are working. Ahmad has big and serious responsibilities. He has to be ready to be able to respond to his family's needs and help whenever they need it. 

He has been working in repairing tractors for the past 25 years and has his own shop. Today, he’s asking for a loan of $1,600 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase a new generator for his business. He said that with this new equipment, he will be able to carry on his work in a proper way. 

In the future, he plans to take more Kiva loans in order to improve his business.

loans.use: to purchase a new generator for his tractor repair business.

loans.name: Bassem

texts.en:
Bassem is a 34-year-old Lebanese man. He’s married, living with his wife and two children who are still attending school. He works really hard to support his family whenever they need him. He has been working at installing and repairing air conditioners for the past eleven years and has his own shop.  He’s professional and has gained a fair number of customers so far. 

Today, he wants to borrow $2100 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase needed equipment for his business such as electrical tubes and keys in addition to air conditioners. This will definitely increase his sales therefore his profits and thus his revenue.  In the future, he plans to renovate his shop and add new and diverse items to it.

loans.use: to purchase needed equipment for his business such as electrical tubes and keys in addition to air conditioners.

loans.name: Samwel

texts.en:
Samwel is 36 years old, married, and has three children. He has been running a motorcycle transport business for the last four years.

He is applying for his second loan from KADET of Kes 50,000. He intends to use the loan to purchase another motorcycle. With the anticipated profits he will diversify and invest in another business.

His hopes and dreams are to diversify his business and become successful businessman.

loans.use: To purchase another motorcycle.

loans.name: Jawad

texts.en:
Jawad is a 41-year-old Lebanese man. He’s single, living on his own. He’s a hard worker seeking a better future. 

In 1995, he started his own business as a constructor. He works independently upon his client’s demands. Today, he’s looking to borrow $3,000 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase new materials such as wood, cement and others. This will certainly facilitate his business operations and help him take more projects.  

In the future, he plans to take bigger projects outside the country and develop his work.

loans.use: to purchase new materials such as wood, cement and others.

loans.name: Francis

texts.en:
Francis is 40 years old, married and has four children. He has been running a motorcycle transport business for the last three years, earning a monthly income of KES 40,100.

He is applying for his  third loan with KADET Ltd. of KES 70,000. He plans to use the funds to purchase another motorcycle. 

With the anticipated profits he will purchase a piece of land and develop it.

His dreams and hopes are to become a successful businessman and grow his business.

loans.use: To purchase another motorcycle.

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en: Patrick  is 38 years old, married with three children aged 2, 11, and 16. He repairs motor vehicles and sells car radiators. He has been in the business for 17 years and has employed one person. He describes his business environment has good because of limited competition. Since he joined Faulu Kenya he has been able to expand  his business. He hopes to expand his business to wholesale in the future. He has applied for 80,000 Kenya Shillings to buy second-hand radiators.

loans.use: To buy second-hand radiators.

loans.name: Moses

texts.en:
Moses is 29 years old, married to Mary, and they have two children. He has been running his motorcycle business for the last four years, earning a monthly income of Kes 39,000.

He is applying for his third loan with KADET Ltd of Kes 80,000. He intends to use the loan to purchase another motorcycle. With anticipated profits he will start another business.

His hopes and dreams are to become a leader in the motorcycle transport business.

loans.use: To buy another motorcycle.

loans.name: Abdel Kader

texts.en:
Abdel Kader is a 47-year-old Lebanese married man living with his wife and seven children who are all studying. Abdel Kader wishes to cover his family expenses as best he can. Because of that, he’s working really hard to be able to reach his goals. He started his own business as a car mechanic in 2005 and has his own garage. 

Today, he’s requesting to borrow $3000 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase needed mechanic's tools for his business. He will benefit from this loan which will improve his work therefore he will get higher income. In the future, he plans to enlarge his garage and hire people to work with him.

loans.use: to purchase needed mechanic's tools for his business.

loans.name: Shohmurod

texts.ru: Шохмурод  вырос в семье фермера, и он изучил бизнес своего отца. Более 10 лет он занимается скотоводством и имеет хороший опыт работы. Его семья поддерживает его и он старается, расширяя свой бизнес улучшить жилищные условия семьи. Он вложил в нем все свои силы и  усилий, чтобы расширить свой бизнес и увеличить поголовье скота. Этот год выдался ему неудачным, была засуха и непрерывные семейные расходы привели его в растерянность. Также он не смог продавать свой скот, потому что цены на рынке были низкими и корм был дорогой. На сегодняшней день он нуждается в вашей поддержке и просить вас о финансовой помощи, чтобы купить скот и корм для них, чтобы расширить свой бизнес и улучшить благосостояние семьи.
texts.en: Shohmurod grew up in a farmer's family and learned his father's business.  He has been involved in animal husbandry for over ten years and has a good work experience.  His family supports him, and he tries to improve his family's living conditions by expanding his business.  Shohmurod invested all of his strength and efforts into expanding his business and increasing livestock headcount.  This was an unlucky year for him, as drought and constant family expenses brought him into uncertainty.  He also could not sell his livestock because prices at the market were low, and fodder was expensive.  Today, Shohmurod needs your support and asks you for financial assistance in order to buy livestock and fodder for it to expand his business and improve his family's welfare.

loans.use: to buy livestock and fodder

loans.name: Omar

texts.en: Omar is a 49-year-old Lebanese married man living with his wife and 2 school-aged children. He strives to work hard to be able to pay his children’s educational fees and fulfill his family's needs. He decided to start his own business as a construction worker 25 years ago. He has good experience and a good reputation as well, which helps him attract new people. Today, he’s asking to borrow 1,300 USD from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase the needed equipment for his business in order to accomplish his projects and carry on his work as it should be. In the future, he plans to take more projects inside and outside the country.

loans.use: to purchase the needed equipment for his business

loans.name: Juma

texts.en:
Juma 58, is a married man with seven children, all of whom attend school. He owns a house that has electricity but not piped water. His greatest monthly expense is food for the family.

For the past five years, Juma has operated a retail shop business, selling to his customer’s and neighbors. He faces a major challenge of high cost of transportation in his business. Juma dreams of expanding his business to a wholesale shop in the future.

With the Kshs 50,000 Juma wants to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, rice and sugar to sell in his shop. He decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost his business.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, rice and sugar.

loans.name: Amira

texts.en: Amira is a 34-year-old married Lebanese woman. She lives with her husband. They’re both cooperating together in order to meet their family's expenses. She has owned a clothing shop since 2003 and has gained a fair number of customers so far. She also works in a local clothing shop. Today, she’s requesting to borrow 3,000 USD from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase additional clothes such as dresses, scarves, pants and many other items. She notes that this loan will certainly help her to get greater returns. In the future, she plans to open other branches of her shop.

loans.use: to purchase additional clothes such as dresses, scarves, and pants

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en: Mohammad is a 20-year-old single Lebanese man living with his one parent and five siblings. Two of them are still attending school, and three others are working. Mohammad and his father are working really hard to be able to fulfill their family's needs and demands. For this reason, he started his own business as an electrician at an early age. He has been working since 2007 on a freelance basis upon customers’ requests. Today, he’s asking to borrow $1,300 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase new electrical tools in order to facilitate business operations and carry out his work properly. In the future, he plans to open his own electrical equipment shop.

loans.use: to purchase new electrical tools

loans.name: Claudio

texts.es: Claudio, de 40 años de edad, convive con Maribel de 31 años fruto de esta relación tienen 5 hijos. Juntos habitan en su casa propia, ubicada en el centro poblado de Canayre del distrito de Llochegua. Claudio es un buen hombre de principios y objetivos claros, él antes se dedicaba a la agricultura juntamente con su querida esposa. Después de un tiempo decidieron emprender un nuevo negocio que es la venta de pollos, por lo que su esposa se encargaría de este negocio, mientras que claudio continuaría con el trabajo en la agricultura. Pero al ver que la venta de pollos les resultaba rentable decidieron ambos dedicarse a este oficio, para poder abastecerse a todos su clientes. En la actualidad el negocio se mantiene en pie con una rentabilidad excelente inclusive ahora cuentan con un galpón pequeño donde tienen en stock más de 300 pollos semanales, y gracias a éste negocio ellos construyeron su vivienda. En un  futuro claudio desea incrementar mas su capital para comprar más pollos. Este será su tercer crédito con MFP, por lo que se compromete en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 3,000 nuevos soles comprará más pollos.
texts.en:
Claudio, 40, lives with Maribel, 31, and they have five children.  They live together in their own house located in the settlement of Canayre in Llochegua District. 

Claudio is a man of principle and clear objectives.  He used to work farming with his beloved wife.  During that time they decided to start a new business selling chickens.  His wife would take care of this new business while Claudio would continue with the farming.  However, seeing that the chicken sales turned out profitable they decided to both of them be in this line of work to supply all their customers.

Currently, the business is stable with excellent profits.  In fact, they now have a small shed where they stock more than 300 chickens a week and thanks to this business they were able to build their house.

In the future, Claudio wants to increase his capital to buy still more chickens.  This will be his third loan with MFP and he pledges to make his installment payments punctually.  He will use the 3000 new soles to buy more chickens.

loans.use: to buy more chickens.

loans.name: Sangali

texts.ru: Сангали женат и имеет двух несовершеннолетних детей. С детства он мечтал иметь свою землю и пользоваться ей по своему усмотрению. Три года назад с большими усилиями он получил сертификат на использование земли, и этот день был особенным для него и его семьи. С начала ему было очень трудно начинать свой бизнес, и он столкнулся с разными барьерами, а потом постепенно все наладилось, так как он хотел, но сильная конкуренция и плохая спрос на сельхозпродукцию привели его в отчаяния, так как продавать сырье по низким ценам ему не выгодно. Данный момент Сангали нуждается в средствах  для покупки  ГСМ, минеральных удобрений и семян репчатого лука. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Sangali is married and has two adolescent children.  Since childhood, he dreamed of having his own land and using it as he pleased.  It took a lot of effort for him to obtain a land-use certificate three years ago, and that day was a special day for him and his family.  At first, it was difficult for Sangali to start his business, and he ran into various barriers.  Then everything gradually smoothed out, just like he wanted, but strong competition and low demand for agricultural crops caused him to despair because it was not profitable to sell crops at low prices.  Currently, Sangali needs money to purchase fuel, mineral fertilizers and onion seeds.  He relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy fuel, mineral fertilizers and onion seeds

loans.name: Osama

texts.en: Osama, a 24-year-old man, still lives with his parents with his five brothers and sister. He wants to open his own business to start building for his future and to help his family with their financial status. So, Osama got a shop and now he wants to start selling mobile phones and accessories. In order to do so, Osama has applied for a loan to buy the latest mobile phones and some products for the store and to work on its decoration.

loans.use: to buy the latest mobile phones and products for his store and to work on its decoration.

loans.name: Sheroz

texts.ru: Шероз очень целеустремленный и трудолюбивый человек. Он женат, супруга занимается домохозяйством. Более 5 лет зарабатывает на жизнь перевозкой пассажиров в городе. Сейчас очень сильная конкуренция и многие занимаются этим, у него нет других источников дохода для содержания семьи. С большими усилиями и трудом он купил машину, взяв долг у родственника и в банке. Свои долги он погасил и в настоящее время его автомашина требует ремонта, чтобы продолжить работу и заработать на содержание  своей семьи. У него очень много клиентов, так как он профессионал и ему все доверяют. Он надеется на вашу помощь и поддержку.
texts.en: Sheroz is a very goal-oriented and hardworking person.  He is married, and his wife is a homemaker.  Sheroz has been earning a living by providing passenger transportation in the city for over five years.  There is currently a very strong competition, and many people are involved in this business, but Sheroz has no other sources of income to support his family.  It took a lot of efforts and difficulties for him to purchase a car, having to borrow money from a relative and from a bank.  He repaid his debts, and currently his car needs to be repaired in order to continue his work and earn a living for his family.  Sheroz has many customers because he is a professional, and everyone trusts him.  He relies on your help and support.

loans.use: to repair his car

loans.name: Soltan

texts.en: Soltan is a 24-year-old single Lebanese man. He lives with his parents and two siblings, one of whom is working and the other is still attending school. His father is the one responsible for the family, striving to offer them a respectable life. Soltan has owned a restaurant since 2010, and he’s known for his delicious food and good place. Today, he wants to borrow $500 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase the needed quantity of food and provisions for his restaurant. In that way, he will be able to carry out his job properly. In the future, he plans to take more Kiva loans and expand his job.

loans.use: to purchase the needed quantity of food and provisions for his restaurant

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en: Mohammad is a 37-year-old Lebanese man. He’s single, living with his parents and only one working sibling. He cooperates with his father to be able to satisfy their family needs. For this reason, he strives to work really hard. He opened his own grocery shop in 2000. He has a wide variety of goods and products and a fair number of loyal customers. Today, he’s asking for a loan of $1300 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase added products for his shop such as soft drinks, dairy products and many other items. He notes that this loan will increase his sales. Therefore, his profits and his revenues will increase. In the future, he plans to open his own mini-market.

loans.use: to purchase soft drinks, dairy products and many other items to sell

loans.name: Ali

texts.en: Ali is a 28-year-old married Lebanese man who lives with his wife and only child. He wants the best for his family, therefore he strives to work under pressure to be a good support for them. In 2010, he opened his own charcoal shop. He delivers charcoal to the neighborhood shops. Today, he is requesting to borrow $1100 from Kiva partner, Ameen s.a.l., to purchase more charcoal for his business. He notes that this will allow him to deliver large quantities at a good price and therefore boost his profits. In the future, he plans to open a charcoal factory.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal for his business.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en: Mohammad is a 39-year-old married Lebanese man living with his wife. They both wish to have children. For this reason, Mohammad is trying his best to build a good future for his family. He has owned a computer shop for the past ten years. He also sells video games. He’s well known in his town as a reputable and friendly person. Today, he’s looking for a loan of $1,300 from Kiva's partner, Ameen s.a.l., to purchase additional computers and video games for his shop. This will boost his sales. In the future, he plans to open his own small networking company.

loans.use: to purchase additional computers and video games for his shop.

loans.name: Tony

texts.en: Tony is a 25-year-old single Lebanese man. He lives with his parents and one sibling who also works. His father takes care of the family. Unlike others in his age group, Tony started to work very early, expecting to help his father with their expenses. He has been working as a plumber since 2007 on a free-lance basis and has a fair number of clients asking for his services. Today, he needs to borrow $1600 from Kiva's partner, Ameen s.a.l., to purchase new tools and equipment for his business. He notes that he’s ready to take on bigger projects and this Kiva loan will help him achieve his goal. In the future, he plans to expand his business and attract new clients.

loans.use: to purchase new tools and equipment for his plumbing business.

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali is 34 years old, married and has three children aged four, six and ten. He runs a hotel and sells tea and rice to earn a living. He has been in the business for six years and has employed one person. He describes his business as a good one because of limited competition.

Ali has applied for a 70,000 KES loan to buy tea leaves, maize flour and sugar. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, Ali has been able to educate his children. He hopes to open a large hotel in the future.

loans.use: to buy tea leaves, maize flour and sugar.

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es:
Carlos, necesita mejorar el negocio, por esta nuevamente solicitando un préstamo, ya que va a cambiar de local con el taller y además comprara nueva mercadería para ofrecer a los clientes un rubro más como un reproductor de DVD y una consola, y también repuestos para el taller.
Él considera haber tenido un efecto positivo en el negocio, con la inversión anterior, pues ha mejorado y prueba de ello este esta aperturando un nuevo negocio con la venta de CD Y DVD.
texts.en: Carlos needs to improve his business so he is once again asking for a loan because he’s going to move the workshop to a new location and will also buy new merchandise to offer his customers an additional line such as a DVD player and a console; and also for spare parts for the shop.  He considers that his previous investment had a positive effect on his business because it’s improved and the fact that he’s opening a new business selling CDs and DVDs is proof of that.

loans.use: to buy CDs, DVDs and a console.

loans.name: Hasan

texts.en: Hasan is a 22-year-old Lebanese single man living with his parents and three siblings who are all working. And because of the heavy life expenses, he was obliged to share responsibilities with his father and start to work on his own in order to enhance his family’s way of living. Hasan opened his own motorcycle repair shop in 2009 and is looking forward to growing his business. Today, he’s asking for a loan of $1,000 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase new mechanical supplies for his shop. With this Kiva loan, he expects a fair increase in his profits and his productivity. In the future, he plans to enlarge his shop to serve a wider range of people.

loans.use: to purchase new mechanical supplies for his shop

loans.name: William Enrique

texts.es: William Enrique es un joven emprendedor que inicio su propio negocio de transporte que es una mototaxi, este lo realiza en la localidad brindando su servicio. El mayor sueño de William era de tener su propio mototaxi con el obejtivo de generar ingresos a la familia. El esta solicitando crédito para comprar algunas herramientas y darle mantenimiento a la  mototaxi.
texts.en: William Enrique is an enterprising young man who started his own motorcycle taxi business, offering transportation services in the town. William’s greatest dream was to own his own motorcycle taxi so he can generate more income for his family. He is requesting a loan to buy some tools and provide maintenance for his motorcycle taxi.

loans.use: to buy tools and provide maintenance.

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es: Miguel Ángel tiene 63 años de edad, su actividad económica a la que se dedica es a la crianza de cerdos en el cual este negocio lo emprendió por la necesidad de generar ingresos a la familia, sus padres le enseñaron ahora él les enseña a sus hijos el negocio de la familia. Miguel Ángel está solicitando financiamiento para la compra de cerdos y poder abastecer a sus clientes que están solicitando.
texts.en:
Miguel Ángel  is 63 years old. 

His economic activity that he is dedicated to is breeding pigs and he began this business because of the need to earn income for the family. His parents taught him, and now he teaches his children the family business. 

Miguel Ángel is asking for a loan in order to buy pigs so he can supply his customers with what they are requesting.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Paul

texts.en: Paul is 32 years old and married with two children. He sells plastic basins and buckets to earn a living. He has been in the business for 3 years. He describes his business environment as competitive because many people do the same business. Since he joined Faulu Kenya he has been able to grow his business. He hopes to be financially stable in the future. He has applied for a loan of 30,000 Kenyan shillings to buy plastic basins and buckets.

loans.use: To buy plastic basins and buckets to sell.

loans.name: Jose Angel

texts.es: José, necesita utilizar un nuevo préstamo, para darle mantenimiento a su vehículo, pagando el mecánico y comprando los repuestos necesarios, esto le ayudará para hacer las reparaciones necesarias y mantener su medio de transporte en buenas condiciones. Para José estos préstamos han sido un gran recurso ya que le han dado una mejor condición pues con ellos le ha dado mantenimiento a su medio de transporte.
texts.en: José needs to ask for a new loan to repair his vehicle by paying the mechanic and buy the necessary spare parts. This will help him having the necessary repairs made and keeping his vehicle in good conditions. These loans have been a great resource for José, as they have improved his standard of living as thanks to this mean he has been able to repair his vehicle.

loans.use: To pay for maintenance works on his vehicle.

loans.name: Mogambi

texts.en: Mogambi is 39 years old and married with two children aged 2 and 4. He runs an electronics shop where he sells electrical wires and electronic accessories to earn a living. He has been in the business for 12 years, and he has employed one person. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to expand his business. He hopes to be financially stable in the future. He has applied for a loan of 100,000 Kenyan shillings to buy electrical wires and electronic accessories.

loans.use: To buy electrical wires and electronic accessories.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy sorbets of various flavors, as well as popsicles.

loans.name: Said

texts.en:
Said is applying for another loan to expand his existing business and to establish a motorbike transportation company.  He will use this 100,000 Kes loan to purchase two bundles of clothes and a motorbike. In the future, Said aspires to continue improving his business. 

Since taking his last Kiva loan, Said has greatly improved his family’s standard of living.  He hopes to continue accessing the financial services offered by Yehu and Kiva lenders and thanks you for your support!

loans.use: to purchase two bundles of clothes and a motorbike for transport  business.

loans.name: Nzai

texts.en:
Nzai is taking another Kiva loan of KES 40,000 to boost his butcher shop business.  With the loan he wants to buy five goats for their meat. He dreams of establishing another butcher shop in town in the future. 

Nzai gives thanks to Yehu and Kiva lenders for providing him with financial services to improve his business.

loans.use: to purchase five goats for their meat.

loans.name: Juana Mercedes

texts.es:
Juana, de 62 años de edad, es comerciante, tiene 12 años de dedicarse  a esta actividad , es originaria de León. Ella empezó con su  primer negocio a los 22 años de edad cuando vendía repuestos y accesorios de bicicletas, motos. Posteriormente inicio a vender ropa le fue generando mejores ingresos y hoy en día este negocio ha ido creciendo y mejorando su condiciones de vida. 
Ella requiere el préstamo para comprar camisas, pantalones , accesorio, ropa interior  para dama. Pues su expectativa es ampliar su negocio vendiendo variedad de ropa y accesorio para vestir a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Juana is 62 years old and is a clothing vendor.  She has made a living from this activity for the past 12 years.  She is a native of León.  Juana started her first business at the age of 22, when she sold spare parts and accessories for bicycles and motorcycles.  She later started selling clothing, which generated more income.  These days her business has been growing and improving her living conditions.  

Juana needs a loan so she can purchase shirts, trousers, accessories, and women’s undergarments.  She expects that this will increase her business selling a variety of clothing and accessories for dressing her customers.

loans.use: to purchase shirts, trousers, accessories, and women’s undergarments.

loans.name: Aziza

texts.en: Aziza, a 48-year-old housewife, has nine sons and daughters – two of them are married. Her husband has retired from the military and started working in the security field based on his experience. To be able to help support their big family, Aziza started a small food store two years ago to sell snacks and candy for the neighbors’ kids. She is now applying for a loan to add more food products other than candy, such as canned food, rice, sugar, etc. She is hoping that one day she can expand her store and register it officially.

loans.use: to bring more food products other than candy into her food store

loans.name: Rena

texts.en: Rena, a 41-year-old housewife, chose to start buying baby and kids clothes at wholesale prices to sell to her neighbors and relatives. Because Rena is a conservative person, she asked her son, Ahmad, to be in the photo instead. It has been two years now since she started her business. She is based at home to help her husband support the family. Ahmad helps his mom buy the clothes. Now Rena is applying for a loan to buy more winter clothes to cover her customers' needs.

loans.use: to buy more winter clothes to cover her customers' needs.

loans.name: Ghada

texts.en: Ghada, a 38-year-old housewife, is married to Sami who works in one of the Jordanian universities. They have two boys and two girls. In order to support her husband and family, Ghada started almost three years ago to buy small amounts of accessories and sell them to friends. Then, by word of mouth, others started to make orders. So, she started to buy small quantities of different types of accessories based on what the people are asking for. Now, Ghada has applied for a loan so she can buy a bigger variety products at a wholesale price, start looking for a small shop to rent near her house and start the business in a professional way.

loans.use: To buy more goods at wholesale prices

loans.name: Sumaya

texts.en:
Sumaya is almost 41 years old now. She is married and is living with four sons and daughters and her husband. Because Sumaya is a conservative person, she asked her husband Mohammad to appear in the photo. Mohammad is a construction worker in the daytime. After that, he helps his wife in her small business at home.

Sumaya started a small business at home to get another source of income for the family. Her business is basically selling some types of basic food products such as rice, sugar, and candy for kids. She also sells and refills detergents at home for the neighbors.
 
She is now applying for a loan to buy more food and cleaning products so she can one day move her business from the house to a small shop and serve more customers.

loans.use: to buy more food products for her store

loans.name: Ammi

texts.en:
Ammi is a single man, who owns a house that has electricity but not piped water. His greatest monthly expense is the high cost of electricity.

For the past four months, he has been operating a car washing business; his potential customers are motor vehicle operators. He faces a major challenge from theft because of a lack of security in his place. He dreams of expanding and incorporating a spare parts shop into his business in the future.

With the KES 50,000, he wants to purchase a compressor and a tank for the car washing business. He decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost his business.

loans.use: to purchase a compressor and a tank for a car washing business.

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en:
Patrick is 39 years old and married with two children aged 16 and 20. He is an electrician and also repairs televisions and computers to earn a living. He has been doing this for 8 years. He describes his business environment as competitive because many people are in the same business. 

Since he joined Faulu Kenya he has been able to grow his business. He hopes to be financially stable in the future. He has applied for 100,000 Kenyan shillings to buy electrical gadgets such as sockets.

loans.use: to buy electrical gadgets such as sockets.

loans.name: James

texts.en: James is 35 years old and married with two children who are 10 and 12 years old. He has owned a retail shop for 16 years and has employed two people. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to grow his business. He hopes to expand his business to a wholesale one in the future. He has applied for 50,000 Kenya Shillings to buy sweets, loaves of bread and biscuits.

loans.use: To buy sweets, loaves of bread and biscuits

loans.name: Benjamin Fundi

texts.en:
Benjamin Fundi is a 36-year-old boda boda (motorcycle) operator in Changamwe, Mombasa. He is the married father of one. He has been in the business of ferrying people with a motorcycle for the past four years and he is doing great.

This is Benjamin’s third loan from KADET. He plans to purchase an additional motorbike. He will use the anticipated profits to educate his child and repay his loan. He hopes to have a bigger, more profitable business.

loans.use: to purchase an additional motorbike.

loans.name: Ronald

texts.en:
Ronald is 33 years old and married. For the past two years, he has run a retail shop to earn a living. Ronald describes his business environment as good because there is limited competition. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, Ronald has been able to expand his business.

Ronald is requesting a 65,000 KES loan to buy sugar and maize flour. He hopes to expand to wholesale in the future.

loans.use: to buy sugar and maize flour

loans.name: Kamal

texts.en: Kamal is a 44-year-old married Lebanese man living with his wife and three children. He’s doing the best he can to satisfy his family's needs and offer them a good life. He has been working in construction for the past twenty years and waiting for the right time to expand his business. Today, he is asking to borrow $1100 from Kiva's partner, Ameen s.a.l., to purchase new tools. This Kiva loan will help him develop his business. In the future, he plans to open his own construction office.

loans.use: to purchase new tools for his construction business.

loans.name: Muhabbat

texts.ru:
Мухаббат умная и целеустремленная женщина. Она замужем и любящая мать четверых детей. Её муж является предпринимателем, чтобы помогать мужу она начала заниматься торговлей 6 лет назад. Он продает женскую, подростковую и детскую обувь. Она вложила все свои средства и силы в него, чтобы стать успешной предпринимательницей. Раньше она продавала хозяйственные товары, а потом постепенно перешла в продажу обуви.
Мухаббат хотела бы получить займ в размере 2000$ США для пополнения оборотного 
капитала. Она надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Muhabbat is a smart, goal-oriented woman. She is married and a loving mother of four children. Her husband is an entrepreneur, and, to help him, she started working in retail six years ago. He sells footwear for women, teenagers, and children. She has invested all her funds and energy in this in order to become a successful entrepreneur. She used to sell household goods, but then gradually transitioned into shoe sales. Muhabbat would like to receive a loan of USD$2000 to replenish working capital. She is counting on your assistance and kindness.

loans.use: To replenish working capital

loans.name: Francis

texts.en: Francis is 35 years old, married with 5 children. He operates a mobile money transfer business (m-pesa) to earn a living. He has been in the business for 5 years and has employed two people. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, Francis has been able to support his family financially. He hopes to be financially stable in the future. He has applied for 70,000 Kenya Shillings to add cash flow to his business.

loans.use: to add cash flow to his business

loans.name: Jabbor

texts.ru: Джаббор трудолюбивый и честный человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет пятерых детей. Его мать живет с ними, она всегда поддерживает его и дает хорошие советы. Более двух лет он занимается скотоводством и имеет хороший опыт в этой сфере бизнеса. В основном он покупает скот по низкой цене а затем откармливает их в течении определенного периода, потом продает за выгодную цену. От данного бизнеса он получает хорошую прибыль на содержание своей семьи. Он хотел бы получить займ для покупки мелкого и крупного рогатого скота с целью увлечения поголовье скота и расширения бизнеса.
texts.en: Jabbor is a hardworking and honest person.  He is married and is raising five children.  His mother lives with them and always supports him and gives him good advice.  Jabbor has been involved in animal husbandry for over two years and has a good experience in this business area.  He primarily buys livestock at a low price, then fattens it during a set period of time, and then sells it at a profitable price.  He makes a good profit from this business to support his family.  Jabbor wants to obtain a loan to purchase small livestock and cattle in order to increase livestock headcount and expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase cattle and small livestock

loans.name: Elshan

texts.ru:
Elshan jenat i imeyet odnogo rebonka. On yavlyayetsya IDP personom pereselenec iz Fuzuli goroda seychas projivayet v Baku regione vmeste so svoyey jenoy i detmi. Elshan 27 let. On uje 2 qoda kak rabotayet masterom delayet remont v raznix domax,kvartirax. Seychas on nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit nujniye instrumenti dlya svoyey raboti chtobi razvivat yeyo. 

Внутренне перемещённое лицо (ВПЛ) - человек, который был вынужден внезапно бежать из своего дома в результате вооружённого конфликта, насилия, нарушений прав человека, стихийных бедствий или других катастроф, но, в отличие от беженца, не перешел международную границу и находящийся на территории собственной страны (источник: Управления ООН по Координации Гуманитарных Вопросов).
texts.en:
Elshan is married and has one child.  He is an IDP from the Fuzuli city and now lives in the Baku region with his wife and children.  Elshan is 27 years old.  He has been working as a repairman for two years and does repairs in different houses and apartments.  Currently, he needs 2000 AZN to buy necessary tools for his work in order to grow his business.

An internally displaced person (IDP) is a person, who was forced to suddenly flee his home as a result of a military conflict, violence, violation of human rights, natural disasters or other catastrophes, but what differs him from a refugee is the fact that did not cross an international border and is located on the territory of his own country (source: United Nations Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs).

loans.use: to buy necessary construction tools

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Lino

texts.es:
El señor Lino, es un hombre trabajador y luchador que constantemente está asumiendo retos para poder salir adelante y ayudar a sus hijos que aún necesitan de él. Él señor Lino, es soltero y se dedicaal cuidado de sus hijos y a su trabajo, actualmente esta pequeña y humilde familia viven en la ciudad de Camaná, ubicada al sur del país y caracterizada por los deliciosos platos marinos que brinda, como prueba de ello el señor Lino considera que el “Chupe de Camarones” es el mejor de todos y por ello lo ha elegido como su plato de comida favorita.

Lino no pudo terminar el colegio, pero sabía que esto no lo iba a detener y lo iba  estancar, como todo joven luchador que era empezó a incursionar en distintos tipos de negocio, hasta que en un momento llego a comprarse una moto taxi y desde esa fecha labora 12 horas al día y atiende a 50 clientes, este desempeño y dedicación tienen sus resultados al final el día porque puede ganar hasta S/.70 en un buen día, estos ingresos y esta lucha constante le han permitido matricular a sus hijos en centros superiores para que ambos pueda desarrollarse profesionalmente, él desea que ellos sean unos muy buenos profesionales, siempre honrados y apasionados por que hacen.

Él sueña con poder comprarse otra moto taxi y hacer algunas reparaciones en su vivienda, que sus hijos continúen acudiendo a sus estudios, pero para esto necesita poder comprarse otra moto taxi, el señor Lino considera una meta llegar a comprarsela en 6 meses y generar muchísimos más ingresos, pero para poder llegar a comprársela necesita ahorrar y darle duro a su trabajo, él ha tenido la idea de darle mantenimiento a su moto taxi y así poder asegurar su herramienta de trabajo y lograr los ingresos que necesita para poder lograr su GRAN SUEÑO.
texts.en:
Lino is a hardworking and determined man. He is constantly taking on challenges in order to get ahead and help his children who still depend on him. Lino is single and dedicates himself to caring for his children and to his work. At present this small, humble family lives in the city of Camaná, which is located in the south of the country; Camaná is known for delicious seafood dishes. As proof of that, Lino considers shrimp chowder the best dish of all, and therefore chose it as his favorite food. 

Lino wasn't able to finish high school, but knew that that wasn't going to hold him back. Like the determined youth he was, he began to make excursions into different types of business until the moment when he bought a moto taxi. Since then he has worked twelve hours a day and attends to 50 customers. His performance and dedication show results at the end of the day, as he can earn up to S/.70 on a good day. This income and his constant effort have allowed Lino to enroll his children in superior schools, so that both can develop themselves professionally. He hopes that they will be very good professionals, honorable and passionate for what they do. 

Lino's dream is to be able to buy another moto taxi and to make some repairs to his home, so that his children can continue with their studies. But to do this he needs to buy another moto taxi. Lino's goal is to buy it in six months and generate substantially more income, but in order to be able to buy it he needs to save and work hard. He has had the idea of making some repairs to his moto taxi and this way can secure his 'tool of the trade' and earn the income necessary for his great dream.

loans.use: to maintain his moto taxi.

loans.name: Julius

texts.en:
Julius is 49 years old.  He runs a cafeteria to earn a living.  He has been in the business for thirteen years and has employed one person.  He describes his business environment as good because there is limited competition.  He earns extra income from his farming business. 

Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to save his income.  He hopes to be financially stable in the future.  He has applied for a loan of 50,000 Kenya Shillings to buy utensils and maize flour.

loans.use: to buy utensils and maize flour.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to help his mother and his sister.

loans.name: Kassem

texts.en:
Kassem is 31 years old.  He is a single man and lives with one of his parents and a sibling.  He and his brother work hard in order to meet his family's needs and provide a comfortable life.  After twelve years of experience, Kassem opened his own shop selling car wheels in 2005.  He sells wheels in the highest volume possible in order to please the maximum number of customers. 

At this time, he is requesting a loan of $2,100 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. in order to purchase additional wheels to sell in his shop. This loan will enable Kassem to increase both his sales and his earnings. In the future, he plans to open his own shop selling cars.

loans.use: to purchase additional wheels to sell in his shop.

loans.name: Edward

texts.en: Edward is 57 years old, married and the father of seven children. For the last 21 years, he has earned a living by running a retail stall where he earns about Kes. 17,000 a month. He is applying for his fourth loan from KADET Ltd., for Kes 30,000, to buy more cooking oil, rice sugar and wheat and maize flour. He will use the additional income made possible by this loan to expand his business. His dream is to own a wholesale shop in the future.

loans.use: to buy cooking oil, rice, and maize and wheat flour.

loans.name: Muslum

texts.ru:
Muslum 12 let kak rabotayet masterom po proizvodsvte kamney. Seychas on nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chto bi kupit nujniye instrumenti dlya svoyey raboti. Muslum jenat i imeyet 2 detey. Yemu 47 let. On yavlyayetsya IDP personom pereselenec iz Kalbadjar, seychas projivayet v Absheron regione vmeste so svoyey jenoy i detmi. Etomu biznessu Muslum uchilsya u svoyego otca kotoriy toje bil masterom.

Внутренне перемещённое лицо (ВПЛ) - человек, который был вынужден внезапно бежать из своего дома в результате вооружённого конфликта, насилия, нарушений прав человека, стихийных бедствий или других катастроф, но, в отличие от беженца, не перешел международную границу и находящийся на территории собственной страны (источник: Управления ООН по Координации Гуманитарных Вопросов).
texts.en:
Muslum has been working as a stonemason for 12 years.  Currently, he needs 2000 AZN to purchase necessary tools for his work.  Muslum is married and has two children.  He is 47 years old.  He is an IDP from Kalbadjar and currently lives in the Absheron region with his wife and children.  Muslum learned this business from his father, who was also a stonemason.

An internally displaced person (IDP) is a person, who was forced to suddenly flee his home as a result of a military conflict, violence, violation of human rights, natural disasters or other catastrophes, but what differentiates him from a refugee is the fact that did not cross an international border and is located on the territory of his own country (source: United Nations Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs).

loans.use: to purchase necessary tools

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali is a 28-year-old married Lebanese man who's living with his wife and two children. He's the one responsible for his family and is looking to enhance their way of living. 

He has owned his own pickup for the past seven years. His job consists of transporting all kinds of products such as vegetables, home furniture, and many others to the neighboring shops and areas. He works independently, on a freelance basis. 

Today, he's asking to borrow $1600 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to repair his pickup's engine and perform some needed maintenance on it. This will certainly facilitate his business operations and develop his job. In the future, he plans to buy a bigger pickup to attract a wider range of customers.

loans.use: to repair his pickup's engine and perform necessary maintenance on it

loans.name: Batkhuyag

texts.en:
Mr. Batkhuyag, 40, is a taxi driver and works around Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. For many years he has been running his business every weekday. He lives with his wife and his three children in the a slum district. Lately his taxi has been getting old and is damaged in most of its parts. It has a bad influence on his earnings and the quality of his service. Therefore he decided to exchange his car for the new one which is named Hyundai Verna. But he lacks money to cover its cost. 

Therefore the loan he is taking will be dedicated to covering the cost of purchasing the car to improve his business. As he said, his earnings will be increased notably after he has the new car.

loans.use: To cover the cost of  purchasing a car to improve the business.

loans.name: Ramon Alcides

texts.es:
Ramon, es comerciante de ropa, vive con sus esposa, aun no tiene hijos, Él solicita un préstamo para la reparación de la motocicleta, ya que en ella se traslada a los lugares donde vende, el préstamo le ayudara para tener en buen estado la moto y poder continuar sus actividades cotidianas.
El quiere tener un negocio más grande, tener algo propio, además que con su esposa quieren procrear hijos. Su vida a cambiado desde el ultimo prestamo, porque ahora tiene un hogar que mantener, su esposa y un nuevo negocio.
texts.en:
Ramon sells clothes for a living.  He lives with his wife and they do not yet have any children.
