Now Hiyam uses her talent as a business and has started making kids' toys and decorations for baby showers, as well as general decorations for other events and celebrations.

Hiyam is applying today for a loan to improve her business and open an independent shop for accessories and decorations.

loans.use: to open an independent shop for accessories and decorations.

loans.name: Waleed

texts.en:
Waleed is a 37-year-old married man from Baqa'a; Jordan and a father of four children.

Waleed is a wholesaler who sells grocery goods and he is requesting a loan of 1500 JD to purchase goods for trading purposes.

Waleed is looking to expand his business through importing and exporting goods to neighboring countries such as Kuwait, Saudi Arabia and Iraq with his partners so that he can improve his family's living conditions and ensure his children's future.

loans.use: To purchase goods (grocery goods) for trading purposes

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 64-year-old married man from Ashrafia, Amman; Jordan.

Mohammad is a baker and he is requesting a loan of 2000 JD to purchase an electric oven for his bakery.

Mohammad is looking to improve his project and open a new branch for his business. He is also looking to purchase a home for the family.

loans.use: to purchase an electric oven for his bakery.

loans.name: Artush

texts.en:
Artush is 39. He lives in Tsovagyugh village, Sevan area with his wife and school age children, a son and two daughters. 

Artush has a private mini shop where he trades food and household goods. He is also engaged in animal breeding. Artush breeds cows, calves, bull calves, sheep and pigs.
 
Artush sells his milk and meat to his fellow villagers and to buyers from the Sevan food market. His wife helps her husband in his businesses.

Thanks to his occupations, Artush is able to support his family. 

Now he intends to develop his farm and his shop assortment before the New Year’s holidays. So he needs a 1,000,000 AMD loan to buy three more bull calves for his farm and to buy a large lot of beverages and  foods and pastry for his shop.
 
This is Artush’s second loan from Kiva and Nor Horizon. He used his first loan to increase his shop assortment.

loans.use: to buy three more bull calves for his farm and to buy a large lot of beverages, foods and pastry for his shop.

loans.name: Khaled

texts.en:
Khaled is a 41-year-old Lebanese man.  He is married and lives with his wife and his four children, who are still attending school. He is the one responsible for his family and seeks to offer them a better future. 

Khaled worked as a mechanic for many years; and in 2000, he started to work independently; he specializes in repairing trucks. 

Today, he is requesting to borrow $1,600 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase new mechanical tools for his business. With these tools, he will be capable to carry on his work properly. In the future, he plans to open his own mechanic garage.

loans.use: to purchase new mechanical tools for his business.

loans.name: Kassem

texts.en: Kassem is a 30-year-old Lebanese engaged man living with his parents. Despite heavy living expenses, the family is really thankful for what his father has done so far and is going to do. Kassem started his own business as a car dealer in 2003. His job consists of selling and buying used cars on a freelance basis. In parallel, he’s an employee of a local company. Today, he’s looking to borrow $3000 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase a car in order to resell it and make good profits. In the future, he hopes to make the needed savings so as to be able to afford his wedding expenses as he plans to get married soon.

loans.use: purchase a car for his job

loans.name: Nabil

texts.en:
Nabil is a 32-year-old Lebanese man. He's married and living with his wife and two school-age children. 

He states that through cooperation he and his wife became capable to enrich their way of living. She works as an accountant in a local company. As for Nabil, he has been working in car trading for the past 10 years, and he's really satisfied with the results he has attained so far. Today, he's looking to borrow $3,000 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase extra used cars in order to continue his job properly and therefore increase his revenues. In the future, he plans to open his own car showroom.

loans.use: to purchase extra used cars

loans.name: Ramon Elias

texts.es: El señor Ramón a sus 58 años de edad es padre de tres hijos, propietario de una pequeña tienda desde hace un año, la cual esta localizada en su casa en el municipio de Sonsón localizado al oriente de Antioquia, donde ofrece a sus vecinos los productos de la canasta familiar. El señor Ramón es comerciante desde hace 30 años, actualmente, el señor Ramón requiere de la compra de surtido tal como arroz, panela, aceite, frutas y verduras, que le permita ofrecer una amplia variedad de productos a sus clientes y así poder aumentar sus ingresos y ofrecer a su familia una mejor calidad de vida. El sueño del señor Ramón es comprar un local para independizar la tienda de su casa y tener más espacio para vender los productos y ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes y una casa propia donde vivir con su esposa y tres hijos.
texts.en: Ramon is 58 years old and is the father of three children. He has owned a small store for the past year, located in his home in the municipality of Sonson, in the eastern part of Antioquia, where he offers her neighbors basic products for consumption. Ramon has been a commercial vendor for 30 years, and he currently needs to buy a range of products like rice, "panela" natural sugar, oil, fruits and vegetables, which will allow him to offer a wide variety of products to his customers in order to improve his income and provide his family with a better quality of life. Ramon's dream is to buy his own store outside of his own house and have more space to sell his products and offer better service, as well as a home where he can live with his wife and three children.

loans.use: buy a range of products like rice, "panela" natural sugar, oil, fruits and vegetables

loans.name: Jesus Washington

texts.es:
Jesus es un hombre trabajador que tiene muchas aspiraciones en los años próximos de prosperar en su pequeña tienda ya que tiene una familia conformada de dos hijos y su esposa. 

Comenzó con el negocio vendiendo pequeñas cosas con su esposa poco a poco comenzó a tener ingresos. Ahora el trabaja en su tienda con su esposa.  

Tiene muchas aspiraciones por eso quiere continuar su tienda para darle una mejor vida a sus dos hijos. Por eso quiere el préstamo para comprar vivieres para la tienda como arroz, aceites, bebidas, granos etc.
texts.en: Jesús is a hardworking man who has lots of goals; he hopes to make progress in the coming years in his little store because he has a family composed of two children and his wife.  He started the business selling little things with his wife and gradually began to earn income.  Now, he and his wife work in his store.  He has many hopes and this is why he wants to continue with his store to give his two children a better life.  This is why he wants the loan to buy groceries for the store like rice, oil, beverages, grains, etc.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for his store.

loans.name: Pedro Vicente

texts.es:
El señor Pedro es un hombre de 39 años, es casado y junto a su esposa tiene 3 pequeños hijos de 5,8 y 12 años, todo ellos acuden a la escuela, pero actualmente se encuentran en días vacacionales. Para poder salir adelante el y su esposa trabajan arduamente todos los días, su esposa es una mujer que se dedica a la venta de menús, cervezas y salchipollos, esta ganancias les permiten recaudar el dinero necesario para los gastos del hogar.

Pedro, como todo hombre de familia responsable, se dedica a la venta diaria de Raspadillas  desde las 9 de la mañana hasta las 5 de la tarde, este duro laborar le permite ganar en promedio S/.80 diarios y si es un muy buen día, que es lo que Pedro desea a diario, él puede ganar hasta S/.180, normalmente atiende entre 60 y 130 clientes. El sabe que su negocio tiene éxito porque los jarabes que usa para la preparación de sus raspadillas están a base de pura fruta y atiende muy bien a sus clientes.  Pedro tiene que aprovechar esta temporada tan calurosa en la ciudad de Mala, porque solo es en estos 3 primeros meses del año donde su producto va ser muy solicitado.  Su analista nos comentó que el señor Pedro fue ubicado en una plaza de Coayllo, ubicada en la ciudad de Mala, y ha debido de esperar para poder realizar la entrevista debido a que tiene mucha afluencia de clientes, incluso hay combis y autos de donde la gente se baja especialmente para comprar su producto y luego retornar al automóvil donde se encontraban.

Esta familia está en constante apego y apoyo familiar, es por esto que Pedro también ha incursionado en dedicarse a la albañilería, solo cuando tiene contratos de construcción, y es así como genera ingresos los meses restantes del año para su familia. Gracias al apoyo de los prestatarios Kiva, él podrá comprase una moto lineal, la misma que le servirá para poder llevar su rica raspadilla a zonas aledañas y vender cuando hayan festividades o actividades de otro tipo, su meta es poder generar los ingresos necesarios para educar a sus 3 pequeños e implementar su negocio con sillas y esas nuevas, pero su sueño más grande es poder ampliar su casa y colocar el restaurant que tiene su esposa en la parte frontal de la misma.
texts.en:
Pedro is a 39-year-old man.  He’s married and he and his wife have three little children who are 5, 8 and 12 years old, all attending school although they are currently on vacation.  In order to get ahead, he and his wife work hard every day.  His wife’s a woman who sells daily meals, beer and ‘salchipollos’ [traditional fast food snack consisting of fried potatoes with fried chicken and condiments].  Profits allow them to earn money needed for household expenses.

Pedro, like all responsible family men, works every day.  He sells ‘raspadillas’ [shaved ice topped with flavored syrup] from 9 in the morning until 5 in the afternoon.  This hard work enables him to earn on average 80 soles a day and if he has a very good day, which is what Pedro wishes for every day, he can earn up to 180 soles.  He normally tends to between 60 and 130 customers.  He knows that his business is successful because the syrups he uses to make the shaved ice are based on pure fruit and because he provides very good customer service.  Pedro must take advantage of the hot season in the city of Mala because during the first three months of the year his product is highly sought-after.  His loan adviser commented to us that Pedro was situated in one of Coayllo’s squares located in the city of Mala and his interview had to be postponed because of the large affluence of customers he has.  Besides, there are buses and autos that the people get off of precisely to buy his product and then climb in again.

This family constantly support and love each other and this is why Pedro has also gone into bricklaying but only when he gets construction contracts.  This is how he generates additional income for the family during the other months of the year.

Thanks to support from Kiva lenders he will be able to buy a linear motorcycle that he can use to transport his shave ice maker from place to place and go to nearby zones to sell when they have their festivals or other types of activities.  His goal is to generate the necessary income to educate his three little ones and to supply his business with new tables and chairs.  But his greatest dream is to be able to enlarge his house and install his wife’s restaurant in the front part of it.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle to move his shaved ice maker from place to place.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is 31 years old, married, and has one child who attends school. He is responsible for his family and is their only support. For this reason, he opted to have his own business hoping to enhance their standard of living. 

After being involved for 15 years in the barbering business, Ahmad opened his own salon in 2004, looking to gain new customers. He is requesting a loan for $1,200 from Ameen s.a.l., which he will use to change his salon’s interior design. He notes that this may improve his mood and push him to work harder, thereby increasing his profits. In the future, he plans to enlarge his salon and hire people to work with him.

loans.use: to change his salon’s interior design.

loans.name: Alisher

texts.ru: Алишер перспективный умный человек, ему 26 лет. Он женат. Более 5 лет он занимается торговлей на центральном рынке. В основном он продает продукты питания и имеет широкий ассортимент продуктов. Он хочет расширить свой бизнес и таким путем зарабатывает деньги, чтобы содержать свою семью в хороших условиях жизни. Алишер хотел бы получить займ в размере 1000$ США для покупки продуктов питания с целью увлечения ассортимента продуктов и расширения бизнеса. Он надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en: Alisher is a promising intelligent 26-year old. He is married. For over 5 years he's been trading on the central market. He mainly sells food and offers a wide range of products. He wants to expand his business and earn money to provide good living conditions for his family. Alisher would like to receive a loan of $1000 in order to purchase more products, expand the assortment of his goods, and grow his business. He hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy more food products for his store

loans.name: Kelvin Jalil

texts.es:
Kelvin de 27 años, es un hombre trabajador que tiene muchas aspiraciones en los años próximos de prosperar en su pequeña tienda.

Comenzó con el negocio vendiendo pequeñas cosas poco a poco comenzó a tener ingresos. Ahora el trabaja en su tienda vendiendo víveres variados.  

Tiene muchas aspiraciones por eso quiere continuar su tienda. Por eso quiere el préstamo para comprar vivieres para la tienda como arroz, aceites, bebidas, granos etc.
texts.en:
Kelvin, 26 years old, is a hard-working man with lots of aspirations for the next few years; he hopes to prosper in his little store.

Kelvin began the business selling small things and, little by little, he began to earn income. Now, he sells a variety of groceries in the store.

Kelvin hopes to achieve his goals and, to do this, he wishes to continue with his store. To do so, he requests a loan to buy groceries to supply the store, including rice, cooking oil, drinks, grains, etc.

loans.use: buy rice, cooking oil, drinks and grains to sell.

loans.name: Suhrobjon

texts.ru: Сухробчон житель города Вахдат. Он женат. Ему 33 года. У него трое детей. Он более шести лет занимается торговлей. Сухробчон занимается торговлей продуктов питания. Кроме того он продает кондитерские изделия. Кредит берет для приобретения продуктов, чтобы увеличить оборот.
texts.en: Suhrobjon lives in the city of Vahdat. He is 33 years old, married, and has three children. He's been engaged in trade for over six years. Suhrobjon sells food products and also pastries. He is taking the loan to purchase more products and increase the volume of his sales.

loans.use: to purchase more food products for his store

loans.name: Davronbek

texts.ru: Давронбек женат и ответственный отец троих несовершеннолетних детей. Его отец занимался скотоводством, а он помогал отцу и наблюдал за его делами. Постепенно он вырос и мечтал открыть свой бизнес и стать богатым человекам. Пять лет тому назад он начал самостоятельно заниматься этим бизнесом. Данное время он хочет расширить свой бизнес и получить хорошую прибыль на содержания своих детей. Давронбек хотел бы получить займ для покупки скота с целью расширения бизнеса. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Davronbek is married and is a responsible father of three adolescent children.  His father used to be involved in animal husbandry, and Davronbek helped his father and watched over his work.  As Davronbek gradually grew up, he dreamed of opening his own business and becoming a rich person.  He started to run this business independently five years ago.  At the present time, he wants to expand his business and make a good profit to support his children.  Davronbek wants to obtain this loan to purchase livestock in order to expand his business.  He relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to purchase livestock and expand his business

loans.name: Mohamad

texts.en: Mohamad is a 54-year old Lebanese married man living with his wife and five children. Four of them are working while the other is still attending school. With his hard work, Mohamad is hoping to fulfill his family's needs and pay his child’s educational fees. He has been working as an independent taxi driver since 2004. In parallel, he works in security in a local company. Today, he’s facing problems with his car, so he asks to borrow $1300 from kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to replace his old car with a new one in order to be able to carry on his work in a proper way. In the future, he plans to buy another car and hire someone to work on his behalf.

loans.use: to replace his old car with a new one

loans.name: Pirmat

texts.ru: Пирмат добрый и трудолюбивый человек. Он женат и имеет двух сыновей. Они оба взрослые и женаты. Он начал свой бизнес 8 лет назад. Он занимается откормом скота и продажей корма. Последние два года он занимается выращиванием лука. В прошлом году с одного гектара земли он получил 30 тонн лука и получил хорошую прибыль. С прибыли он купил себе новую автомашину. В бизнесе помогают ему сыновья. Данный момент Пирмат нуждается в вашей помощи и поддержке. Ему нужна финансовая поддержка в  покупке семян и селитры. Он надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие. Спасибо большое.
texts.en: Pirmat is a good and hardworking man.  He is married and has two adult sons who are both married.  Pirmat is involved in the fattening of livestock and the sale of animal feed, an activity he started eight years ago.  For the past two years he has also been growing onions.  Last year, with one hectare of land, he was able to grow 30 tons of onions and received a good profit.  With this profit, he bought a new car.  His sons help him with the business.  Pirmat needs your help and support.  He needs financial support to buy seeds and nitrates.  He looks forward to your help and mercy.  Thank you very much.

loans.use: To buy seeds and nitrates.

loans.name: Luis Javier

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Managua, el señor Luis Javier se conoce por ser un buen trabajador con buenos valores morales como persona, debido a que ha sabido llevar el progreso a su hogar y ha logrado darle una mejor condición de vida a su familia. 

Como todo padre de familia responsable, Luis Javier se ha preocupado por llevar el sustento a su hogar y aunque las difíciles situaciones económicas afectan, él siempre ha tenido la perseverancia y doble esfuerzo por beneficiar a su amada familia que tanto requiere de su apoyo.

Se presentó a Ceprodel con una necesidad la cual consiste en solicitar un crédito para consolidar deuda que había adquirido con una entidad con el fin de suplir las necesidades para su hogar por medio de algunos electrodomésticos y otros. Al obtener el crédito, logrará cancelar estas deudas y de esta forma, continuará trabajando arduamente para beneficio de toda su amada familia.
texts.en:
Luis Javier, who lives in Managua, is known for being a hard working man with high moral values. He has brought progress to his home and has been able to offer better living conditions to his family. 

Like all responsible fathers, Luis Javier is concerned with sustaining his home and even though he has been affected by difficult economic situations, he has always persevered and worked twice as hard in order to benefit his beloved family, whom he supports.

He came to this institution’s office asking for a loan in order to consolidate his debts with other institutions, when he purchased supplies for his home, such as appliances and other things. With this loan, we will be able to pay off those debts, and will continue working hard for the benefit of his beloved family.

loans.use: to pay off a debt.

loans.name: Manuel De Jesús

texts.es:
Manuel de Jesús, reside en el municipio de Ticuantepe destacándose como un excelente cocinero el cual posee  su negocio de restaurante desde hace 17 años. Tanto él y su esposa  se encargan de ofrecer sus servicios de comida principalmente en las horas de tarde ya que en esa hora hay más demanda.

El crédito que está solicitando lo invertirá en la compra de materia prima para la elaboración de comidas y refrescos, arroz, carne, aceite, queso, frijoles, coca cola, jugos enlatados, etc.

Espera que su crédito sea aprobado satisfactoriamente para así continuar elaborando los deliciosos platillos que tanto le agradan a sus clientes
texts.en:
Manuel de Jesús lives in the municipality of Ticuantepe. He's well known for being an excellent cook who has owned a restaurant business for the past 17 years. Both he and his wife are in charge of offering food services mainly in the afternoon hours due to the higher demand at that time. 

Manuel will be able to invest in the purchase of ingredients for the preparation of meals and refreshments such as rice, meat, oil, cheese, beans, coca cola, canned juices, with the loan he is requesting.

He hopes that his loan will be approved in order to continue making  the delicious dishes that his customers love so much.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for the preparation of food and refreshments such as rice, meat, oil, cheese, beans, coca cola, and canned juices.

loans.name: Aleida

texts.es: Aleida es una señora dedicada a su trabajo, el cual la caracteriza por hacerlo con bastante entusiasmo. Aleida, a sus 43 años de edad ha formado un hogar que esta compuesto por su esposo y sus dos hijos, a quienes siempre les quiere brindar el sustento necesario. Aleida, se dedica a la venta de productos de uso personal a tavés de catálogos de muestra, y sus clientes son sus familiares y amigos del sector de su residencia. Aleida sueña con ampliar la variedad de productos que ofrece a sus clientes, para así poder aumentar los ingresos de su hogar, y mejorarles la calidad de vida a sus hijos y su esposo. Debido a que tiene algunos pedidos atrazados, Aleida requiere un préstamo para comprar los productos de su pedido y así poder atender los pedidos que le realizaron. Aleida teme que por no poder cumplir con sus pedidos, su clientela prefiera seguir comprándoles a otras vendedoras y por tanto, le tocará ver como su sueño de ofrecerles una buena educación y una estabilidad económica a sus hijos se irá aplazando.
texts.en: Aleida is a woman who is dedicated to her work, which she does with great enthusiasm.  Aleida, who is 43 years old, has formed a home that is made up of her husband and their two children.  She always wants to provide them with the necessary support.  Aleida, sells personal products through show catalogs, and her clients are her relatives and friends from the area of her residence.  Aleida dreams of increasing the variety of products that she offers to her customers.  This way, she will be able to increase her income from her home and improve the quality of life for her children and her husband.  Since she has some delayed orders, Aleida is requesting a loan to buy the products of her order, and therefore be able to fulfill the orders that have been given to her.  Aleida is afraid that since she is not able to fulfill their orders, her customers will prefer to buy the things from other sellers and therefore see her dream fail of offering her children a good education and stable finances.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as personal products.

loans.name: Gustavo Cesar

texts.es:
Gustavo Cesar  tiene 41 años de edad, él vive Ica, Perú. Ica se encuentra ubicado en el Desierto de Sechura cerca de cuatro horas al sur de Lima, la capital del país, y es aclamado por los peruanos como "La Tierra del Sol". Es conocida en el Perú por sus frecuentes terremotos (un 8,0 en 2007 y 6.9 en 2011), su producción de uvas, espárragos y aceitunas, y tal vez sobre todo, como la fuente de la bebida tradicional del Perú nacional, el Pisco. En este clima cálido y árido se encuentra la casa y empresa del cliente; como bien se sabe el Perú se caracteriza por tener las comidas más deliciosas del mundo y uno de los platos que le gusta mucho es el  “arroz Chaufa”. Gustavo estudió hasta quinto año de secundaria debido a los pocos recursos económicos de sus padres pero le hubiera gustado estudiar Ingeniería Civil. 	
Gustavo es conviviente, su pareja trabaja en la venta salchipapas, juntos tienen 2 hijos, el mayor cursa el quinto grado de secundaria y el menor cursa el primer año de primaria.	
		
Gustavo se dedica al trabaja en la elaboración de ladrillo y quema de ladrillo, se dedica a este trabajo 5 horas diarias, en un día puede atender a 1 cliente  debido a que esta clase de trabajo es muy duro y muy trabajoso, esto le permite ganar hasta S/. 60 diarios y en un buen día puede ganar hasta S/.80 lo que le ayuda en algunos gastos adicionales  del hogar  y para  invertir en el negocio, el cree que le va bien en su negocio siempre hay clientela para este tipo de trabajos, asimismo porque trabaja apoyando a su esposa en la venta de mototaxis y también les va muy bien por la sazón que tiene su pareja en la elaboración de los platillos.

Actualmente está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que con este apoyo podrá ayudar a su pareja a realizar un mantenimiento de su carrito sandwichero  y con esta mejora tendrá mas insumos  para la elaboración de sus salchipapas y hamburguesas asi como también aumentaran los ingresos para mejorar su calidad de vida y así seguir ahorrando  lo que lo ayudará a cumplir su gran sueño: “Darle una profesión a sus hijos."
texts.en:
Gustavo Cesar is 41 years old.  He lives in Ica, Peru.  Ica is located in the Sechura Desert, almost four hours south of Lima, the country's capital, and it is renowned by Peruvians as the "Land of the Sun."  It is known in Peru for its frequent earthquakes (one 8.0 in 2007 and one 6.9 in 2011), its grape, asparagus, and olive production, and perhaps above all as the source of Peru's traditional national drink, pisco.  This customer's home and business can be found in this hot, dry climate. It is common knowledge that Peru has some of the most delicious food in the world and one of his favorite dishes is arroz chaufa.  Gustavo only went to school up until the fifth grade because of his parents' limited financial resources, but he would have liked to have studied civic engineering.

Gustavo lives with his partner, who sells salchipapas.  They have two children together, the eldest of whom is in the fifth grade, with the youngest in the first grade.
	
Gustavo molds and fires bricks for a living.  He does this work five hours a day and he is able to serve one customer per day.  Because this work is very hard and demanding, he is able to earn 60 nuevos soles a day and on a good day he can earn up to 80, which helps him with extra household expenses and which allows him to invest in his business.  He believes that his business is going well because there is always a clientele for this kind of work.  He also works helping his partner sell mototaxis and this is going well for them because of the way his partner seasons her dishes.

At the moment, he is very thankful to Kiva's borrowers because with this help he will be able to help his partner do some maintenance work on her sandwich cart and with this improvement she will have more supplies with which to make her salchipapas and hamburgers.  This will also increase her earnings, which will improve their quality of life and allow them to continue to save, which will help them achieve their greatest dream: offering their children a profession.

loans.use: to perform maintenance on a sandwich cart

loans.name: Armen

texts.en:
Armen is 39 years-old and he lives in Ijevan city. Armen is married and has three children: two school aged daughters and a three year-old son.
His wife stays at home and takes care of their children, while Armen runs a fruit and vegetable shop. With his business income Armen was able to buy a van and now he delivers fruits and vegetables from Yerevan, different villages of Armenia and even from Georgia. He sells his merchandise from his van or from tables and boxes on the street. 

Thanks to his business income he meets his family’s needs and has bought necessary furniture for their house. Now Armen is making an emphasis on potatoes and onion trading as his regular customers lay in a stock of these vegetables in winter. Armen is asking for a loan of 350,000 Armenian drams to buy a large lot of oranges, tangerines and lemons to resell before New Year’s holidays.

This is Armen’s second loan both from Kiva and Nor Horizon.

loans.use: to buy a large lot of oranges, tangerines and lemons to resell

loans.name: Behruz

texts.ru: Бехруз житель города Вахдат. Ему 38 лет. Он женат. У него большая дружная семья.  Он отец 8 детей. Бехруз один зарабатывает в семье. Он занимается торговлей женской и мужской обуви. Кредит берет для закупа сезонного товара.
texts.en: Behruz is a resident of the city of Vahdat.  He is 38 years old, married and has a large and friendly family.  He is a father of eight children.  Behruz is the sole provider for his family.  He is involved in selling women's and men's shoes.  He is requesting this loan for the purchase of seasonal merchandise.

loans.use: to purchase seasonal merchandise

loans.name: Nozimjon

texts.ru: Нозимджон женат, ему 29 лет. Жена занимается шитьем национальных платьев дома. Нозимджон старательный и трудолюбивый человек. Когда ему было 3 года, он остался сиротой, его родители умерли, а потом его растили родственники. С ранних лет у него была мечта добиться успеха и стать перспективным бизнесменом. А когда он вырос он начал свой бизнес и более двух лет он в этом бизнесе. Он занимается купле- продажей запчастей для автомобиля. У него двое детей, они еще маленькие. Он содержит их за счет прибыли, который получает от данного бизнеса. Нозимджон запрашивает займ для покупки запчастей аккумулятор, насосы, дизмасло, колодки, шина и т.д. Он надеется на вашу помощь, который позволить ему осуществить его мечту. Спасибо вам большое!
texts.en: Nozimjon is married and 29 years old. His wife sews national dresses at home. Nozimjon is a diligent and hardworking person. When he was 3 years old, he was orphaned; his parents died and he was raised by his relatives. From an early age, he dreamed of being successful and becoming an ambitious businessman. When he grew up, he started his own business and has had his business for more than two years. He buys and sells auto parts. He has two children, both are still young. He provides for them with the profit that he receives from his business. Nozimjon has requested a loan to buy a spare battery parts, oil, pumps,  pads, tires, etc. He looks forward to your help, which will help him achieve his dreams. Thank you very much!

loans.use: To buy merchandise

loans.name: Chehadi

texts.en: Chehadi is a 49-year-old Lebanese married man living with his wife and three children who are still attending school. He’s the one taking care of his family and looking to offer them a fair way of living. He has been working in renting tents and chairs on a freelance basis since 1997. He’s an expert in his job and well known to his customers. Today, he needs to borrow $1,100 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to buy additional supplies of tents and chairs in order to respond to his customer’s demands and therefore increase his revenues. In the future, he plans to open his own shop.

loans.use: to buy additional supplies of tents and chairs

loans.name: Bassam

texts.en: Bassam is a 27-year-old Lebanese, engaged man who lives on his own. He is responsible for covering his expenses so he decided to start his own business. He hoped to be able to enhance his way of living and then get married. After eight years experience as a barber, he opened his own salon in 2005. Today, he’s asking for a loan of $700 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to renovate his salon. He notes that this will allow him to attract more customers and therefore increase his revenue. In the future, he plans to open a women's hair dressing area.

loans.use: to renovate his salon

loans.name: Kamal

texts.en: Kamal is a 32-year-old Lebanese, married man who lives with his wife and two school-aged children. He is lucky to have such a good and supportive wife; they both cooperate to cover their expenses. It didn’t take him long to start his own business as a car mechanic in 2007. He admits that he has his own, loyal customers asking for his services. Today, he needs a loan of $2000 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase a new motorcycle for his business. He will then be able to transport his tools and better serve his customers. In the future, he plans to open his own garage.

loans.use: to purchase a new motorcycle for his business

loans.name: Tarek

texts.en: Tarek is a 35-year-old Lebanese, single man living on his own. He is trying his best and is working hard to be able to get married and have his own family. In 2005, after eleven years of experience in cars and wheels trading, Tarek decided to start working on his own, on a free-lance basis. In parallel, he has been working for a local company since 2000. He is requesting to borrow $2500 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase extra products for his business such as wheels and a few cars. This Kiva loan will boost his business and allow him to attract new customers. In the future, he plans to open a car spare parts shop.

loans.use: to purchase extra products such as wheels and cars

loans.name: Raefat

texts.en: Raefat is a 52-year-old Lebanese, married man. He lives with his wife and three children. He’s trying the best he can to fulfill his family's needs. He has been working as a taxi driver since 2001 and has gained a fair number of loyal customers. He works independently, on a free-lance basis. Today, he needs to borrow $600 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to perform maintenance on some mechanical issues and pay his car’s mechanic's fee. This will facilitate his business operations. In the future, he plans to buy a minivan to service more people.

loans.use: to perform mechanical maintenance and pay his car’s mechanic's fee

loans.name: Ghada

texts.en: Ghada is a 39-year-old Lebanese, married woman living with her husband and four children who still attend school. She strives to work really hard to support her husband with their family expenses. She has been working as a wedding dress trader from her home since 2005 and, also, as a beautician. Her husband works as a tailor in a local factory. She wants to borrow $1200 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase a new collection of wedding dresses. This loan will increase her sales and, therefore, her revenue. In the future, she plans to open her own wedding dress shop.

loans.use: to purchase a new collection of wedding dresses

loans.name: Hussein

texts.en: Hussein is a 35-year-old Lebanese married man living with his wife and three school-aged children. He supports his family with pleasure and covers their expenses. He has been working in his own vehicle repair shop since 1997 and doesn’t mind working under pressure if this can help him build a strong and better future for his family. Today, he needs to borrow $2100 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to renovate his garage and improve his business. He notes that this will allow him to perform a better job and attract more customers. In the future, he plans to open a car spare parts shop next to his garage.

loans.use: to renovate his vehicle repair garage

loans.name: Roumanous

texts.en:
Roumanous is a 26-year-old single man who opened a mobile phone-selling shop six years ago.

This business is improving and at the same time competition is increasing. That's why each one must find his specialty and that's what Roumanous is doing. 

Roumanous is a man with very good communication skills who treats his customers in a very attractive and elegant way. He makes special offers all the time to attract new customers and to keep current customers.

To keep up updated with the new technologies, Roumanous is requesting a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua to add new mobile phones and special accessories to his merchandise. This new stock is attractive enough to increase his income and let him dream of a shining future.

loans.use: To add new mobile phones and special accessories to his merchandise

loans.name: Héctor Antonio

texts.es: El señor Héctor Antonio tiene 44 años de edad, vive con su esposa y sus hijos los cuales se encuentran estudiando. El seños Héctor, posee un pequeño taller automotriz el cual es su principal fuente de ingresos. Tiene algunos años de dedicarse a esta actividad por lo que ya posee mucha experiencia. El señor Héctor es un hombre increíble y luchador ya que con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado mantener su pequeño negocio del cual saca los ingresos necesarios para dar de comer a su familia. Su principal objetivo es su familia en especial sus hijos ya que tanto él como su esposa sueñan con ver a sus queridos hijos como grades profesionales y con mejores oportunidades a las que ellos han tenido. Esta es la razón por la que día con día El señor Héctor se levanta muy temprano para atender su taller y prestar el mejor servicio posible. Ha tomado la decisión de invertir en su negocio para mejorar el servicio que presta a sus clientes, con el fin de mejorar su situación económica que cada vez es más difícil.  Todo lo anterior lo ha llevado a tomar la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para comprar variedad de herramientas, un compresor, grasa, etc. de tal forma que los clientes puedan recibir el mejor trato posible a la hora de solicitar sus servicio y puedan seguir frecuentando su negocio. Tiene plena confianza que de esta manera logrará su objetivo.
texts.en: Hector Antonio is 44 years old and lives with his wife and children. His children are currently enrolled in school. Hector has a small automotive shop which is his principal source of income. He has worked as a mechanic for a number of years, and as a result has a lot of experience. Hector is an incredibly hard-working man. Through lots of effort he has managed to maintain the small business which provides him with the income necessary to put food on the table for his family. His main concern is his family, especially his children. Both he and his wife dream of seeing their beloved children in professional careers and with better opportunities than they have had themselves. This is the reason Hector gets up early day in and day out to take care of his shop and provide the best service possible. He has decided to invest in his business to improve the services he offers his customers, and ultimately improve his own economic situation, a challenge which continues to prove more and more difficult. For these reasons, he has decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL to purchase a variety of tools, including a compressor and grease, among other items, so that his customers can receive the best deal possible when they come to his shop, which will encourage them to keep coming back. He is fully confident that he will be able to achieve his goals.

loans.use: to purchase tools, a compressor, and grease, among other items.

loans.name: Alex

texts.en:
Alex Muturi is a single man of twenty-eight years. He runs a motorbike transport business in the outskirts of Limuru town. He also has a retail shop as a second business in the same area. Alex has been in this business for four years now and gets a monthly income of about forty-five shillings per day.

This will be Alex’s fifth loan with KADET LTD after he repaid all other loans successfully. With this loan he plans to open another retail shop in Limuru town. In future he wants to become a successful businessman.

loans.use: To buy stock for his retail shop, like sugar, rice and beans.

loans.name: Fouad

texts.en: Fouad is a 39-year-old Lebanese married man. He lives with his wife and four children. Three of them are still attending school while the other one is working. Fouad strives to work really hard in order to enrich their way of living and to cover the heavy costs of life. He began to work as a furniture painter in 1997 and has already twenty-five years of experience in this domain. He has gained different clients from different areas especially because of his good reputation and well organized work. Today, he’s requesting to borrow $1,000 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase new painting tools to improve his business.  In the future, he plans to open his own furniture gallery.

loans.use: to purchase new painting tools to improve his business.

loans.name: Karimjon

texts.ru: Каримчон молодой семейный мужчина 37 лет,имеет троих детей, жена с высшим образованием. У них семейный бизнес - животноводство. Более 15-ти лет присматривает за скотом (только крупно-рогатый скот), держит их 6-8 месяцев и продает на скотном рынке. Также Каримчон вместе с братьями имеет мясную лавку на центральном рынке, где может реализовать свой скот. В период кредитования с нашей организацией с 2009 года он уже который раз берет кредит на покупку скота и расширяет поголовье. Условия содержания у него хорошие. Сам разбирается очень хорошо в животноводстве, во время болезни скота также может сам вылечить стадо. На получаемый кредит планирует также закупить несколько голов скота, так как сейчас скот немного подешевел в зимний период.
texts.en: Karimjon is a young, 37 year-old family man, who has three children, and his wife has a higher education.  They have a family animal husbandry business.  Karimjon has been taking care of livestock (only cattle) for over 15 years.  He keeps it for 6-8 months and sells it at a livestock market.  Karimjon and his brothers also have a butcher shop, where they can sell their livestock.  Over the period of obtaining financing from our organization since 2009, this is his yet another loan to be used for the purchase of livestock and growth of livestock headcount.  He has good conditions for keeping livestock.  Karimjon knows animal husbandry very well and can also cure the herd himself during livestock illness.  He plan to use this loan to also purchase several heads of livestock because livestock prices have dropped somewhat during the winter period.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Michael

texts.en:
For the last 20 years, Michael has been operating a retail shop in Emali town. He is 64 years old and married to Mwikali.

He was introduced to KADET by another KADET client. Michael repaid his previous loan well and in good time and currently has requested another loan which he intends to use to buy wheat flour, maize flour, crates of sodas, 3 bags of sugar, rice and cooking oil.

In the future, Michael hopes to expand his business, thus increase his income.

loans.use: to buy wheat flour, maize flour, crates of sodas, 3 bags of sugar, rice and cooking oil

loans.name: Mohamad

texts.en: Mohamad is a 29-year-old single Lebanese man. He lives with his parents and has three working siblings. Their father is their main income provider, but they all cooperate together in order to cover the heavy living expenses. In 2001, Mohamad started his own business as a barber and opened his own salon. He’s very grateful for what he has attained so far. Today, he’s looking to borrow $3,000 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to perform needed maintenance on his salon and improve its decor. This will definitely boost his earnings. In the future, he plans to enlarge his salon and hire people to work with him.

loans.use: to perform needed maintenance on his salon and improve its decoration

loans.name: Haitham

texts.en: Haitham is 39 years old, married and lives with his wife and four children, all of whom attend school. For the last 18 years, he has worked hard as a taxi driver to support his family and pay his children's school fees. He is applying for a loan for $2,000 from Kiva partner Ameen to upgrade his car’s engine, perform needed maintenance and have the vehicle painted. This will allow him to carry on with his work in a proper way. In the future, he plans to buy a minivan in order to transport more people.

loans.use: to improve and repair a taxi.

loans.name: Williams

texts.es: Williams es empleado de una empresa farmacéutica en la ciudad de La Paz. El crédito lo solicita para una adquisición de un anticrítico (anticrético es una figura legal mediante la cual se firma un contrato entre el dueño de casa y el inquilino por un periodo de a tiempo de dos años, donde el inquilino entrega por adelantado una cantidad de dinero acordada para poder vivir en la casa del dueño de casa; al final del tiempo establecido, el dueño de casa debe devolver la totalidad del dinero). Williams es soltero y no tiene hijos. Vive en casa de sus padres ubicada en la zona  de Alto San Pedro  de la Ciudad de La Paz. Williams se encuentra muy contento  ya que el crédito le ayudara a independizarse. Es la primera  vez que trabaja junto a  kiva y también la primera vez que solicita un crédito.
texts.en:
Williams is employed by a pharmaceutical firm in the city of La Paz.  He requests the loan to buy an ‘anticrético’ (anticrético is a legal strategy whereby a contract is entered into between the owner of a house and the tenant for a two-year period in which the tenant pays the agreed-upon amount of money up front to live in the owner’s house; at the end of the established time frame, the house owner must return the entire amount of money).  

Williams is single and has no children.  He lives in his parents’ house located in the city of La Paz’s Alto San Pedro zone.  Williams is very happy about the loan because it will help him become independent.  It’s the first time he’s worked with Kiva and also the first time he’s requested a loan.

loans.use: to invest in an 'anticrético' so that he can become independent and live by himself.

loans.name: Akmal

texts.ru: Акмал женат и любящий отец двоих детей. Жена занимается домохозяйством. После распада СССР он потерял свое место работы, а потом он решил заниматься торговлей. Около 5 лет он занимается купле- продажей овощей. Сейчас он хочет расширить свой бизнес и максимизировать свою прибыль. С прибылью он хочет покупать компьютер, чтобы обучать своих детей для того чтобы они были образованными и стали специалистами отличного класса. Акмал запрашивает займ для покупки сельхозпродукции для перепродажи с целью увлечения оборотного капитала. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Akmal is married and is a loving father of two children.  His wife is involved in household work.  After the breakup of the USSR, Akmal lost his job and then decided to get involved in sales.  He has been involved in buying and selling vegetables for about five years.  Currently, he wants to expand his business and maximize his profit.  He wants to use the profit to purchase a computer in order to teach his children, so that they could become educated and high-class specialists.  Akmal is requesting this loan for the purchase of agricultural products for resale in order to increase his revolving capital.  He relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural products for resale

loans.name: Abdurazzok

texts.ru: Абдураззок женат и ответственный отец двоих детей. Он занимается перевозкой людей, то есть предоставляет услуги такси. Он имеет постоянных клиентов и всегда рад предоставлять им услугу. С прибылью он недавно приобрел новый магазин и там продает женскую одежду и обувь. Его жена на декретном отпуске и он сам обеспечивает семью. Для этого он хотел бы получить займ для покупки нового автомобиля. Он рад, что получает займ от «ИМОН Интернешнл» и программу КИВА за поддержку. Он хочет к рождению будущего ребенка улучшить благосостояние семьи.
texts.en: Abdurazzok is married and a responsible father of two children. He is engaged in transporting people, that is he offers taxi services. He has regular customers and is always happy to provide them with service. With his profits, he recently acquired a new shop where he sells women's clothing and footwear. His wife is on maternity leave and he alone provides for his family. To do so, he would like to obtain a loan to purchase a new vehicle. He is happy to receive a loan from IMON International and thanks Kiva for the support. He would like to improve his family's well-being before the birth of his future child.

loans.use: to buy a new car

loans.name: Francisco Marcelino

texts.es:
El señor Francisco es un hombre trabajador que día a día se esfuerza para salir adelante y disfrutar cada día que tiene. Él es soltero, en algunas cosas sale con sus amigos a jugar fútbol que es una de las actividades deportivas que más disfruta. También nos comenta que disfruta comer del famoso “Pollo a la Brasa”, plato que se consume en su mayoría solo en la noche, hecho a base de un pollo bañado en una salsa especial, acompañado de papas fritas y ensalada.

A Francisco le hubiese podido estudiar “Mecánica de Producción” pero lamentablemente por diversos motivos no pudo cumplir este sueño, es por esto que al ver que no pudo lograrlo no se dio por vencido y decidió brindar el servicio de taxi en la ciudad de Camaná, lugar donde vive, Francisco trabaja de 7 de la mañana hasta las 7 de la noche, este horario tan agotador le permite poder atender a un promedio de 70 clientes y esto le permite ganar un aproximado de S/.50 diarios.

Francisco desea poder comprar algunos muebles para su hogar y un ropero que necesita, es por esto que desea que los prestatarios Kiva lo apoyen y así pueda comprar lo que necesita. Su gran sueño es poder adquirir un terreno y construir su cada allí, sabe que esto solo lo logrará a base de esfuerzo y dedicación.
texts.en:
Francisco is a hardworking man who makes the effort every day to get ahead and to enjoy each day that he has.  He is single.  For some things he goes out with his friends to play soccer, which is one of the sporting activities he most enjoys.  He also tells us that he enjoys eating the famous grilled chicken, a dish that is normally eaten only at night and is made of chicken covered with a special sauce and served with fried potatoes and salad.

Francisco would have enjoyed being able to study machine operation but, unfortunately, for various reasons he was unable to realize this dream.  This is why he did not give up and he decided to offer taxi service in the city of Camaná, where he lives.  Francisco works from 7 in the morning until 7 at night.  This exhausting schedule allows him to be able to serve an average of 70 customers and earn approximately 50 PEN a day.

Francisco wants to be able to buy some furniture for his home and a wardrobe that he needs.  This is why he wants the Kiva lenders to help him, so he can buy what he needs.

His big dream is to be able to get a plot of land and build his house there.  He knows that he will achieve this only through effort and dedication.

loans.use: to buy some furniture and a wardrobe.

loans.name: Faisal

texts.en:
Faisal is a 42-year-old married man from Baqa 'a, Jordan and a father of four children. 

Faisal is a vehicle electrician and is requesting a loan of 1500 Jordanian Dinar (JOD) to purchase equipment needed for his business. Faisal is looking to expand his project through purchasing electric equipment to trade in. 

Faisal intends to employ his brother which will increase the productivity of the business.

loans.use: to purchase electrical equipment

loans.name: Jose Bacilo

texts.es:
José, hombre humilde, trabajador, casado junto con su esposa trabajada en su pulpería vendiendo productos variados desde hace un tiempo siendo su fuente de ingreso, sus planes ampliar su negocio, mejora la infraestructura de su vivienda. 
Para cumplir sus planes requiere invertir en el negocio por lo cual lograran mediante el financiamiento que crédito. Esta solicitando el préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de productos como: paca de ropas, paca de zapatos, quintales de arroz, quintales de azúcar, quintales de frijoles, golosinas, bebidas gaseosa, lácteos, entre otros productos.   
Agradece  a la financiera por el apoyo al inicio de cumplir sus planes y proyectos así también a cambiar su nivel de vida.
texts.en:
José, a humble and hardworking man, is married and working with his wife at a local store, selling many products. This has been his source of income for a while, and his plans are to expand his business and improve the infrastructure of his house. 

To complete these plans he must invest in the business, which he will do with the help of the loan. He is asking for the loan so he can put it towards the purchase of items like packages of rope, packages of shoes, 100 pound bags of rice, 100 pound bags of sugar, 100 pound bags of beans, candies, soft drinks, dairy products, and others. 

He is grateful towards the financial institution for the help to begin his plans and projects, and in that way also improve his standard of living.

loans.use: for the purchase of merchandise in general.

loans.name: Rahim

texts.ru:
Рахим  женат, имеет  4 детей.  Жена нигде не работает, занимается домашним хозяйством. Каждый день, с утра Рахим приходит на свое рабочее место в центре города. На крупнейший в городе рынок Панчшанбе. Здесь он занимается реализацией фруктов и овощей. В его ассортименте бананы, яблоки, груши и тропические фрукты, а из овощей помидоры и огурцы. Весной его снабжают товаром местные фермеры и дехкане, которые сами привозят ему фрукты и овощи.  Зимой он сам ездит за товаром в соседний Узбекистан, а также закупает товар у местных фермеров, которые выращивают его в парниках. В проведении бизнеса, а также когда Рахим уезжает за товаром, ему помогает его старший сын (на фото). А кроме того его сын автомастер и занимается ремонтом автомашин.
С нашей организацией он сотрудничает с 2002 года. за все время сотрудничества он показал себя как образцовый и пунктуальный клиент. На кредит он хочет приобрести автомобиль, который он собирается использовать и в семье и в бизнесе.
Рахим благодарен Арванду за поддержку его бизнеса и надеется на долгосрочное сотрудничество.
texts.en: Rahim is married and has four children.  His wife is not employed and takes care of the household.  Rahim comes to his place of work every morning at the largest city market, Panshanbe, in the city center.  Here, he is involved in selling fruits and vegetables.  His selection includes bananas, apples, pears and tropical fruits, and out of vegetables - tomatoes and cucumbers.  Local farmers and dekhan farmers, who deliver fruits and vegetables to him, supply him with the products in the spring.  He travels to the neighboring Uzbekistan himself in the winter, and also buys products from local farmers, who grow fruits and vegetables in greenhouses.  Rahim's oldest son (shown on the photograph) helps him with running the business and also when Rahim leaves to buy products.  Besides this, his son is an auto-mechanic and is involved in car repairs.  Rahim has been working with our organization since 2002 and has shown himself as an exemplary and punctual client throughout this time.  He wants to use the loan in the sum of 12000 somoni to buy a car, which he plans to use for the family and for the business.  Rahim is grateful to Arvand for supporting his business and hopes to have a lasting partnership.

loans.use: to purchase a car for family and business use

loans.name: Martha Lorena

texts.es: Martha es una emprendedora que ha luchado por salir adelante junto con su esposo fuero ahorrando de su salario para poder emprender este negocio, este negocio se emprende por la necesidad de apoyar a su esposo en los gastos del hogar y sacar a sus hijos adelante. Actualmente esta solicita crédito para invertir en el negocio en la compra gaseosas, golosinas, detergentes, productos para el hogar, pan y jugos entre otros. Martha nos expresa que uno de sus sueños es que sus hijos terminen sus estudios.
texts.en: Martha is an entrepreneur who has fought to move forward together with her husband. They saved their salary in order to be able to start this business, which she started because of the need to help her husband with the household expenses and move their children forward. Currently she is asking for the loan to invest in the business by purchasing soft drinks, sweets, detergents, household products, bread, and juices, among others. Martha tells us that one of her dreams is for her children to finish their studies.

loans.use: to purchase soft drinks, sweets, detergents, household products, bread, and juices, among other items, for her business

loans.name: Mario

texts.es: El señor Mario vive actualmente en alquiler en la zona radial, se dedica  a la construcción,  Es separado de su mujer, tiene 5 hijos, vive con la hija menor la cual le ayuda con los gastos del hogar, el Sr. Mario  trabaja como contratista hace 30 años por lo cual le va muy bien, es por esta razón que se lo esta apoyando, el crédito será destinado para compra de televisor, el cliente agradeció por la confianza que se le esta dando, y por la rapidez que se le otorgo el crédito, ya que esta es la única actividad con la que se mantiene y a su familia.
texts.en: Señor Mario currently lives in a rental in the Radial Zone.  He works in construction.  He is separated from his wife and has 5 children.  He lives with his youngest daughter and helps her with the household expenses.  Señor Mario 	has been working as a contractor for 30 years and things are going very well. It is for this reason that it is supporting him.  He will use the loan to buy a television.  He is grateful for the trust placed in him and for the how quickly he was given a loan since this is the only activity that supports him and his family.

loans.use: purchase a television.

loans.name: Eduardo Santiago

texts.es:
El señor Eduardo es un hombre empeñoso y trabajador al cual le gusta siempre salir adelante junto a su esposa, actualmente ambos se dedican a la venta de zapatillas y sandalias en la ciudad de Camaná, lugar donde trabajan y se desenvuelven diariamente para obtener el dinero que necesitan para progresar continuamente.

Eduardo es un hombre que disfruta mucho jugar futbol en sus tiempos libres; también es un fanático del Pescado frito, en su caso es muy fácil obtener el producto recién salido del mar, debido a que Camaná se encuentra ubicada al lado del Océano Pacífico, ubicado al sur del Perú.

Él y su esposa trabajan aproximadamente 10 horas al día lo que les permite ganar un promedio de S/.150 diarios y en un muy buen día pueden ganar hasta S/.200, este dinero lo ayuda en la compra de mercadería, debido a que para conseguir la misma deben salir de viaje continuamente. Él piensa que su negocio tiene éxito por el buen trato que les brinda a sus clientes.

Con la ayuda de los prestatarios Kiva podrá comprar los nuevos modelos de zapatos y sandalias que necesita por temporada, esto a su vez permitirá que sus clientes encuentren variedad en un mismo lugar y esto hará que muchos más clientes prefieran visitar su tienda.
texts.en:
Eduardo is a striving and hardworking man who always likes getting ahead, with his wife.  At the moment they both sell shoes and sandals in the city of Camaná.  They work there daily to earn the money that they need to progress constantly.

Eduardo enjoys playing soccer in his spare time, and also loves fried fish.  It’s easy for him to get the [fish] fresh from the sea, because Camaná is located along the Pacific Ocean in the southern part of Peru.

He and his wife work approximately 10 hours a day, which allows them to earn 150 PEN per day and up to 200 PEN on a good day.  This money helps them buy merchandise because they must travel to get it.  He believes that his business is successful because of the good customer service he provides.

With the help of the Kiva loans he’ll be able to buy new models of shoes and sandals that he needs for the season.  This will allow his customers to have a variety to choose from in one place, thereby getting customers to prefer his store.

loans.use: to buy more shoes.

loans.name: Hilario

texts.es: El señor Hilario brinda sus servicios en un taller de chapería donde se dedica al desabollado de movilidades, es decir arreglar golpes que las movilidades sufren cuando chocan. Con esta actividad genera ingresos para ayudar a su familia. El crédito es para la compra de herramientas de trabajo como ser una amoladora y un cabezal para compresora. Hilario es casado, tiene cinco hijos .Vive en casa en alquiler  ubicada en la zona  German Bush   de la Ciudad de El Alto. Es la segunda  vez que trabaja con Impro y la primera vez con Kiva .
texts.en:
Hilario provides his services in a bodywork shop.  He devotes himself to fixing dents, that is to say he fixes the damage from car accidents.  With this business activity he generates income to help his family.

The loan is to buy work tools like a grinder and a compressor drive head.

Hilario is married and has five children.  He lives in a rented house in the German Bush zone of the city of El Alto.

This is the second time he has worked with Impro and the first time with Kiva.

loans.use: to buy a grinder and a compressor drive head.

loans.name: Javier

texts.es: El señor Javier es chofer propietario asociado a una de las muchas líneas de “Trufis“ (son taxis con rutas fijas) de la ciudad de La Paz. El crédito lo  solicita para mantenimiento de su movilidad, pues va a cambiar amortiguadores y llantas, ya que es su único ingreso con la cual ayuda a su familia. Javier es casado  y  tiene tres hijos. Vive en casa en alquiler  de la ciudad de La Paz. Es la sexta vez que trabaja con Impro y la segunda vez junto a Kiva, y su historial de pagos es muy bueno.
texts.en:
Javier is a taxi owner and driver associated with one of the many “Trufis” lines (taxis with fixed routes) in the city of La Paz.

He is requesting the loan for vehicle maintenance.  He is going to change the shock-absorbers and tires.  This is his only source of income, which is to help his family.

Javier is married and has three children.  He rents the house where he lives in the city of La Paz.

This is the sixth time he has worked with Impro, and it is the second time he has worked with Kiva.  His payment record is very good.

loans.use: to buy shock-absorbers and tires for maintenance of his taxi.

loans.name: Hasan

texts.en:
Hasan is a 54-year-old married Lebanese man who lives with his wife and four children. Two of his children are working and the others are still attending school. Hasan coordinates with his children to satisfy the family requests and also to pay for his two childrens' educational fees.

In 1990, he decided to start his own business, and has now been working as a taxi driver for twenty-one years. Today, he’s asking for a loan of $2900 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase a new car and replace his used one. He notes that this will allow him to attract more customers and therefore increase his profits. In the future, he plans to buy a big van and organize trips.

loans.use: To purchase a new car and replace his used one.

loans.name: Rahmatullo

texts.ru: Рахматулло женат и ответственный отец четверых детей. Жена занимается домохозяйством и присматривает за детьми. Более 8 лет Рахматулло занимается торговлей на местном рынке города. Он продает мужскую верхнюю одежду. Бизнес начал собственными денежными средствами. За все эти годи, он старался расширить бизнес и сейчас также старается расширить его, чтобы получить хорошую прибыль и улучшить жилищные условия. Рахматулло запрашивает займ для покупки мужской верхней одежды с целью увлечения оборотного капитала.
texts.en: Rahmatullo is married and is a responsible father of four children.  His wife does household work and looks after the children.  Rahmatullo has been involved in sales at the local city market for over eight years.  He sells men's outerwear.  He started his business with his own monetary sources.  Throughout all these years, Rahmatullo has tried to expand his business and tries to expand it now in order to make a good profit and improve living conditions.  Rahmatullo is requesting this loan to purchase men's outerwear in order to increase his revolving capital.

loans.use: to purchase men's outerwear

loans.name: Soninbayar

texts.en:
Mr. Soninbayar, 21, drives a taxi around the districts of Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He has been conducting his business since 2009 and has gained enough experience by himself. He is divorced and his children live with his wife.
 
Recently, he has changed his old Russian car by buying a new one for serving and improving his business. But he still could not pay its costs off to the seller. Changing cars will influence the passengers' satisfaction and increase the number of them. The loan he is taking will be used to cover the cost of his new car for his taxi business.

loans.use: to cover the cost of his new car for his taxi business

loans.name: Uyen

texts.en: Mr. Uyen, 45, works as a welder at a private company and lives with his family in an apartment in Darkhan, the second largest city in Mongolia. Uyen always wants to improve his living conditions. This time, he is planning to make renovations to his apartment because it has become very old and uncomfortable to live in. Especially in winter, heat loss happens through the window due to removed insulation of the window. This apartment was built in the early 1980s and has never had any renovations since it was built. Therefore, he is taking a loan to purchase the building materials needed to make renovations to his apartment by himself.

loans.use: to purchase the building materials needed to make renovations to his apartment

loans.name: Ali

texts.ru:
Ali 39 let. On jenat i imeyet 3 detey. Ali yavlyayetsya IDP personom i pereselenec iz Fuzuli qoroda seychas projivayet v Fuzuli regione vmeste so svoyey lubimoy jenoy i detmi. Yego starshaya dochka uje uchitsya v shkole. 
Ali uje 5 let kak rabotayet taxistom. Seychas on nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit zapchasti dlya pochinki mashini.
Ali ochen lubit svoyu rabotu , etomu biznessu on nauchilsya u svoyego starshego brata.
texts.en:
Ali is 39 years old. He is married and has three children. He is an internally displaced person has been relocated from the town of Fuzili and now lives in the region of Fuzili with his beloved wife and children. His oldest daughter is going to school.

It has been five years since Ali has been working as a taxi driver. Right now he needs 2000 AZN to buy spare parts for fix his car. Ali loves his work a lot and has learned about this business from his oldest brother.

loans.use: to buy spare parts.

loans.name: Murodali

texts.ru: Муродали предоставляет услугу. Он занимается развозкой пассажиров по маршруту Станция – Оби Шифо. В этой области он шесть лет. Ему 40 лет. У него двое детей. Он берет кредит для ремонта автомашины и установки оборудования для природного газа.
texts.en: Murodali offers a service. He conveys passengers along the route between the railroad station and Obi-Shifo. He has been working in this line of business for six years. He has two children. He is requesting a loan to repair vehicles and installing equipment so they can run on natural gas.

loans.use: to repair vehicles and equip them to run on natural gas

loans.name: Francis

texts.en:
Francis is 31 years old, married, and has one child.  To earn a living, he sells cereals.  He has been in the business for five years and has employed one person.  He has grown his business through the financial support from Faulu Kenya.

In five years, he hopes to grow his business into wholesale.  He has requested a loan of 80,000 Kenya shillings to buy beans, maize, rice and peas.

loans.use: To buy beans, maize, rice and peas.

loans.name: John

texts.en: John is 51 years old and married with nine children.  He has been farming for 12 years.  In addition, he owns a retail shop.  He works hard in his business to earn extra income for his family. Through Faulu Kenya, he has grown his retail shop because he is able to add stock. John hopes to grow his shop into a wholesale shop in the future.  He has requested a loan of 50,000 KES to buy sugar, cooking fat and wheat flour.

loans.use: To buy sugar, cooking fat, and wheat flour

loans.name: Peterson

texts.en:
Peterson is 39 years old and married with three children. He does a motorbike transport business to earn a living. He has been in the business since 2007.  He has grown his business through financial support from Faulu Kenya.

Peterson hopes to expand his clientele in the future for more income generation.  He needs a loan of 70,000 Kenya shillings to buy a motorbike.

loans.use: To buy a motorbike

loans.name: Warda

texts.en:
Warda, a 34-year-old housewife, is married to Ahmad who works in the Ministry of Education. They have four children.

To help her husband support their family, Warda started a small snacks and candy market that she wants to expand, adding more food products like sugar, rice, and canned food, and for that she has applied for a loan.

For cultural reasons, Warda asked her father-in-law Hasan to join her in the photo.

loans.use: to expand and add more food products.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad, 32 years old, is a married man who owns a small food market. It has been two years since he opened it. At his shop, he sells canned food, bottled water, and snacks.

Now Mohammad has applied for a loan to buy more products, enhance the shop decoration and shelves, and register the food market officially.

loans.use: to buy more products and enhance the shop decor and shelves

loans.name: Muhamadyosin

texts.ru: Мухамадёсин женат и ответственный отец троих детей. Он трудолюбивый и целеустремленный человек. Мухамадёсин очень старательный человек и более 16 лет он занимается изготовлением и реализацией шашлыков. Он сам занят в данном бизнесе и имеет наемного работника, который помогает ему и получает зарплату. Кроме того он занимается скотоводством и имеет условия для содержания скота, а также имеет корм для них. Откормленный скот идет на мясо. Мухамадёсин хотел бы получить займ в размере 12000 Сомони для покупки крупного рогатого скота.
texts.en: Muhamadyosin is married and is a responsible father of three children.  He is a hardworking and goal-oriented person.  Muhamadyosin is a very diligent person and has been involved in preparing and selling shish kabobs for over 16 years.  He is involved in this business himself and has one hired employee, who helps him and receives an income.  Besides this, he is also involved in animal husbandry and has conditions for keeping livestock, and also has fodder for it.  He uses fattened up livestock for meat.  Muhamadyosin wants to obtain a loan in the sum of 12000 Somoni for the purchase of cattle.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad, 51 years old, is a hardworking man, who is supporting a big family of 10 members.

Three years ago Ahmad opened a store selling different types of tools. Now he wants to enhance the store decoration and add more tools and equipment for sale in his store, and for that he has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to enhance the store decoration and add more tools and equipment.

loans.name: Rafael

texts.es: Rafael es un buen hombre dedicado a su negocio de venta de refrescos, ubicado en el municipio de Soledad, donde vive con su cónyuge y sus 3 hijos en las edades de 7 a 12 años. Su idea de negocio inició una vez quedó desempleado,  cuando trabajó en una fábrica. Fue así como invirtió su liquidación en refrescos y bebidas, y con este negocio ha logrado sacar a su familia adelante. Como en su vida le “ha tocado duro” como él dice, aprendió también el oficio de albañilería, con el que combina su actividad y le ayuda a sostenerse en el mercado y lograr mejorar cada día más,  el bienestar de su familia. En la actualidad, planea aprovechar la temporada de final de año, que es muy buena para vender  especialmente refrescos y bebidas y por eso está aplicando a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el que comprará refrescos, cervezas, galletería entre otros artículos. Su meta más adelante es tener casa propia y su mayor desafío es el poco capital con el que cuenta,  para surtir su negocio de acuerdo a la necesidad  que trae cada temporada comercial.
texts.en:
Rafael is a kind man who is committed to his drink-selling business which is located in the town of Soledad.  He lives in this town together with his wife and three children who are between 7 and 12 years old.  Rafael's business idea was born when he lost his job in a factory.  He invested his severance pay in buying drinks and this business has enabled him to provide for his family.  In his words: 'life has treated [me] harshly' and so he also learned the building trade and he combines this with his business.  It helps him to stay in the market and continually improve his family's well-being.  

Rafael currently plans to make the most of the end-of-year season which is very good for selling drinks.  For this reason, he is applying for a Kiva loan (his first loan from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo).  He will use it to buy soft drinks, beers, cookies and other products.  His future goal is to own his own home.  His biggest challenge is the fact that he has little capital with which to stock his business.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, beer, cookies, etc.

loans.name: Geoffrey

texts.en:
Geoffrey is a 25-year-old man from the Great Rift Valley area of Kenya. He is married to Vivian and they have two children aged 5 and 2 years.

Geoffrey operates an electronics shop, selling electronics such as radios, televisions, and other appliances. He has been doing this business for the last four years and makes a monthly income of KES 35,000. He is taking his third loan from KADET LTD, which he will use to buy more stock of the electronic items for resale.

He desires to open another shop in another town.

loans.use: To buy stock of electronics like radios and televisions to sell.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es: El joven Juan Carlos a sus 20 años de edad es un gran trabajador quien apoya en las labores de reparación de automóviles a su padre quien tiene un taller de mecánica. Con este trabajo el joven aplica los conocimientos de los estudios que tomó en una institución educativa de la ciudad de Medellín. El joven Juan Carlos se caracteriza por su orden y disciplina en el trabajo. Con el fin de ampliar los servicios que se prestan en el taller de su padre, el joven Juan Carlos necesita de la compra de repuestos de vehículos con el ánimo de poder mejorar sus ingresos y así el bienestar de su familia y poder seguir estudiando. El sueño del joven Juan Carlos es tener su propio taller de mecánica.
texts.en:
Juan Carlos is a young 20-year-old man. He is a good worker who helps his father doing mechanical repairs at his auto repair shop. In this work he utilizes the skills he learned while taking classes at an educational institution in the city of Medellín. 

This young man, Juan Carlos, is characterized by his organization and discipline in his work. Juan Carlos needs to buy automobile parts in order to increase the services that his father's shop offers. He also does this with the intention of improving his income and therefor the well being of his family and to be able to continue studying. 

Juan Carlos' dream is to have his own auto repair shop.

loans.use: to buy parts for an auto repair shop.

loans.name: Julius

texts.en:
Julius is a hardworking man who lives in Kasese, Uganda. His family goals are to educate his children and buy a car. 

He has been running a retail shop and also riding a motorcycle thus enabling him to pay off his previous loans and also sustain the family. His major hardships are customers not paying on time and inadequate capital to purchase stock and high fuel prices.

However, he has a dream of buying land and expanding his business into new markets.
 
Julius needs the loan to buy a fridge to help in preserving some of the perishable items in his shop.

loans.use: to buy a fridge for his retail shop.

loans.name: Abduaziz

texts.ru: Абдуазиз целеустремленный и трудолюбивый семьянин.  Жена занимается домохозяйством, а он предоставляет услуги такси в городе. Абдуазиз старается улучшить жилищные условия. Старается во всем и всегда обеспечить семью. Его машина требует ремонта и ему необходимо отремонтировать свою машину, чтобы продолжить свой бизнес. С наступлением зимы следует поменять шины на автомашине, произвести техосмотр автомобиля заменить некоторые запчасти. С этой целью он запрашивает займ. Он надеется на вашу помощь и благодарит вас.
texts.en: Abduaziz is a goal-oriented and hardworking family man.  His wife is involved in household work, and he provides a taxi service in the city.  Abduaziz tries to improve his living conditions.  He tries to always provide everything for his family.  His car requires repairs, and he need to make repairs to his car in order to continue his business.  With the onset of winter, he needs to replace his car tires, conduct a technical inspection and replace several other auto parts.  Abduaziz is requesting this loan to achieve this goal.  He relies on your help and thanks you.

loans.use: to make repairs to his car

loans.name: Abdullah

texts.en:
Abdullah is a 21-year-old, single man from Gaza. 

Abdullah hopes that, through this loan, he will be able to improve his barber shop by buying new furniture for the store. He believes this will attract more attention and bring in more customers.

loans.use: to buy new furniture for his barber shop.

loans.name: Enkhbaatar

texts.en:
Mr. Enkhbaatar, 31, is a driving school teacher. He has been doing this job for many years. He lives with his family in a house located in a boundary district of Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. 

He uses his own car to teach driving school, but lately his car has been malfunctioning and has become impossible to use for driving courses. Therefore, he decided to exchange his old car for a new one. However, it will cost 3,000,000 MNT to purchase the new one, which is made in Korea. The loan he is taking will be dedicated to purchasing this new car.

loans.use: to purchase a new car.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a motor taxi

loans.name: Amani

texts.en:
Amani is a 47-year-old married woman from Marka, Amman in Jordan. She is a mother of five children. 

Amani is trading in clothes and she is requesting a loan of 500 JOD to purchase more clothes.

Amani is looking to expand her project and improve her family's living conditions.

Due to cultural issues, the man in the photo is Amani's husband.

loans.use: to purchase clothes for trading purposes

loans.name: Rauf

texts.en: Rauf is 27 years old. He is a master of repairing old and damaged cars. He is married and has two children. Rauf has been engaged in this activity for 10 years and in the future, he plans to buy his own workshop to increase the income for providing for his family. Now he needs funds in the amount of 1,000 AZN to make repairs at home and to buy a car. Rauf, a dedicated and hardworking man, hopes for your help and thanks you in advance.
